tika-s0404t:6_2: Punappunaṃ katāyāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitāya.
tika-s0404t:6_3: Yuttayānasadisakatāyāti yathā yuttaājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0404t:6_6: Paccupaṭṭhitāyāti bhāvanābahulīkārehi pati pati upaṭṭhitāya avijahitāya.
tika-s0404t:6_7: Samantato citāyāti sabbabhāgena bhāvanānurūpaṃ cayaṃ gamitāya.
tika-s0404t:7_0: Yo ca mettaṃ bhāvayatītiādīsu yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Mettanti mettājhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:8_1: Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhiso pharaṇavasena ca,
tika-s0404t:8_3: Tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge adhigacchantassa sukheneva
tika-s0404t:8_4: paṭighasaṃyojanādayo pahīyamānā tanū hontīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:9_0: Evaṃ kilesappahānañca nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññepi ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “ekampi ce”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:9_1: Tattha aduṭṭhacittoti mettābalena suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto.
tika-s0404t:9_10: sabbe pana pāṇe attano puttaṃ viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahukaṃ pahuṃ anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ
tika-s0404t:9_11: catusaṭṭhimahākappepi attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto
tika-s0404t:10_1: Nipphannasassato nava bhāge kassakassa datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:10_2: Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni sampādentīti āha “sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:11_1: Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. Satta…pe…
tika-s0404t:11_2: bhīsanassāti sattanavutādhikānaṃ pañcannaṃ pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa.
tika-s0404t:14_3: Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi.
tika-s0404t:14_4: Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsaṃ yaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0404t:14_11: Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati.
tika-s0404t:15_1: Tārāgaṇāva sabbeti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti,
tika-s0404t:15_2: evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettassa cittassa vuttalakkhaṇena subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti,
tika-s0404t:16_0: Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “yo na hantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:16_2: Na hantīti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati,
tika-s0404t:16_4: Na ghātetīti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte mārāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca.
tika-s0404t:16_5: Na jinātīti sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato,
tika-s0404t:16_6: jānikaraṇavasena vā aṭṭakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti.
tika-s0404t:16_8: Na jāpayeti parehi payojetvā paresampi dhanajāniṃ na kārāpeyya.
tika-s0404t:16_10: Mettāya vā aṃso aviheṭhanaṭṭhena avayavabhūtoti mettaṃso.
tika-s0404t:19_4: Tuṇhībhāvo na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbatagahaṇaṃ viya aparisuddhoti ariyo tuṇhībhāvo.
tika-s0404t:19_8: Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti,
tika-s0404t:22_8: Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti,
tika-s0404t:25_1: Chaṭṭhe adhikaṃ payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso,
tika-s0404t:28_1: Navame duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā ca.
tika-s0404t:28_2: Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulikassa putto”ti evaṃ āgatā uccākulaputtā jātikulaputtā.
tika-s0404t:28_3: “Saddhāyete kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārakulaputtā nāma.
tika-s0404t:28_6: nandaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti bhagavatā vuttanti āha “jātikulaputto”ti.
tika-s0404t:31_5: Tattha aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vāti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:31_9: Kāraṇenāti codanāya amūlāya amūlikabhāvadīpaniyā yuttiyā vā.
tika-s0404t:31_11: “Ko āpanno”tiādinā codanaṃ vissajjetvāva vikkhepāpajjanaṃ aññenāññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:31_12: Bahiddhā kathāpanāmanā nāma “itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte –
tika-s0404t:31_19: “evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ vā upaneti,
tika-s0404t:31_21: Yo pana “itthannāmaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭho “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
tika-s0404t:31_25: Taṃ tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vadati,
tika-s0404t:32_0: Kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamathāti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva anapekkhā apanetha.
tika-s0404t:32_1: Kasambuṃ apakassathāti kasambubhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ pabhinnapaggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakaḍḍhatha.
tika-s0404t:32_7: Yathā palāpā antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhī viya dissanti,
tika-s0404t:32_8: evaṃ pāpabhikkhū anto sīlarahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti,
tika-s0404t:37_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame verañjāyaṃ viharatīti ettha verañjāti tassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:37_8: saddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷimattānipī”tiādīsu mūlamūle dissati.
tika-s0404t:37_14: tasmā naḷeruyakkhena adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:37_15: So kira pucimando ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi.
tika-s0404t:37_16: Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge vihāsi.
tika-s0404t:38_0: Paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha “nāsanā vuṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-s0404t:38_3: vayoanuppatteti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0404t:38_5: vayoanuppatte disvā”ti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:38_7: tasmā na paccuṭṭhātīti uṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:38_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0404t:38_10: Nāsanā vuṭṭhātīti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:38_12: Na abhivādeti vāti na abhivādetabbanti vā sallakkhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:39_0: Taṃ aññāṇanti “ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī”ti ajānanavasena pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:39_2: kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ garuṃ kareyya”ntiādisuttavaseneva ñāṇacakkhunā olokento.
tika-s0404t:40_2: sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
tika-s0404t:40_3: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā disā viloketi,
tika-s0404t:41_0: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sattapadavītihārupari ṭhitassa viya sabbādisānulokanassa kathitattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:41_1: na panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā.
tika-s0404t:41_2: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi,
tika-s0404t:41_10: uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ uttaradisā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:41_11: Olokesinti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.
tika-s0404t:42_5: Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:42_10: Mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggaloti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya araho anucchaviko puggalo.
tika-s0404t:43_2: mādisā vā arasarūpā”ti vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya.
tika-s0404t:44_8: Rūpaparibhogena uppannataṇhāsampayuttasomanassavedanā rūpato nibbattitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo viya rūparasāti vuccanti.
tika-s0404t:44_11: Anukkhipantoti attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa asappāyabhāvato attānaṃ anukkhipanto anukkaṃsento.
tika-s0404t:45_0: Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacananti “jahitā”ti etasmiṃ atthe tathāgatassāti karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:45_4: kārañca dīghaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti āha “tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā”ti.
tika-s0404t:45_6: Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve “ārāmavatthū”ti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:45_7: evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite tālassa vatthubhūtapubbattā “tālavatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:45_9: Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:45_11: vuttaṃ “tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate”ti.
tika-s0404t:45_14: Tālāvatthukatāti vuccantīti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0404t:45_15: Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.
tika-s0404t:46_1: Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto tālāvatthūti āha “matthakacchinnatālo viya katā”ti.
tika-s0404t:46_2: Etena “tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā”ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito.
tika-s0404t:46_3: Ettha pana “avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti avatthutālakatā”ti vattabbe visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:46_5: rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā hutvā pubbe uppannakusalākusalā dhammā gahitā,
tika-s0404t:46_6: te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā,
tika-s0404t:46_7: tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti.
tika-s0404t:46_8: Imasmiṃ atthe “abhinandantāna”nti iminā padena kusalasomanassampi saṅgahitanti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:46_10: saddo pacchāsaddena samānatthoti āha “yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:47_1: so pariyāyo na hotīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi,
tika-s0404t:47_4: Nanu cāyaṃ brāhmaṇo yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātapariyāyaṃ sandhāya “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti āha,
tika-s0404t:47_5: “so pariyāyo natthī”ti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ dassento āha “nanu cā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:48_1: Sandhāyabhāsitamattanti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo “nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:48_2: Bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti,
tika-s0404t:49_3: “Anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammāna”nti sāmaññavacanepi pārisesañāyato vuttāvasesā akusaladhammā gahetabbāti āha “ṭhapetvā te dhamme”tiādi,
tika-s0404t:50_0: Ayaṃ lokatantīti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyalakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī.
tika-s0404t:50_1: Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena
tika-s0404t:50_3: Rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vatthukāmakoṭṭhāsesu uppajjamāno rāgo “pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo”ti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:51_0: Jigucchati maññeti ahamabhijāto rūpavā paññavā kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ kareyyanti jigucchati viya,
tika-s0404t:51_2: Akusaladhamme jigucchamāno tesaṃ samaṅgibhāvampi jigucchatīti vuttaṃ “akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā jigucchatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:52_5: Vinayaṃ vā arahatīti ettha vinayanaṃ vinayo,
tika-s0404t:52_8: Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu sakatthe arahatthe ca taddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati,
tika-s0404t:52_9: na pana “vinayāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti imasmiṃ atthe.
tika-s0404t:52_10: Tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha “vicitrā hi taddhitavuttī”ti.
tika-s0404t:52_12: Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ atthe taddhitappayogo lokassa,
tika-s0404t:52_13: tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā taddhitavutti,
tika-s0404t:52_15: evaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayikoti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:53_1: Byañjanāni avicāretvāti tissadattādisaddesu viya “imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo”ti evaṃ byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā,
tika-s0404t:54_0: “Devalokagabbhasampattiyā”ti vatvāpi ṭhapetvā bhummadeve sesadevesu gabbhaggahaṇassa abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha
tika-s0404t:54_1: gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā dassento āha “devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:54_3: Mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentoti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento,
tika-s0404t:54_4: akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchimhi nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ
tika-s0404t:54_5: paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:54_8: “Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho”ti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā
tika-s0404t:54_12: tasmā hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:54_14: dassento”ti heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo”ti. Gabbha-
tika-s0404t:54_15: saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo “gabbhe vasati māṇavo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:54_16: Atthi mātukucchismiṃ nibbattasattapariyāyo “antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:54_17: Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha “anāgate gabbhaseyyā”ti.
tika-s0404t:54_22: Ettha ca yadipi “apagabbho”ti imassa anurūpato gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā,
tika-s0404t:54_23: pasaṅgato pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:55_2: Imasmiṃ pana vikappe gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattīti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva vuttantipi vadanti.
tika-s0404t:55_3: Nanu ca “āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā”ti vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā eva pahīnā,
tika-s0404t:55_4: na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha “yathā cā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:55_5: Atha “abhinibbattī”ti ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha “abhinibbatti ca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:55_6: Apunabbhavabhūtāti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.
tika-s0404t:56_0: Dhammadhātunti ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu,
tika-s0404t:56_6: Desanāvilāsappatto hotīti rucivasena parivattetvā dassetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso,
tika-s0404t:56_9: Tādilakkhaṇameva puna upamāya vibhāvetvā dassento āha “pathavīsamacittata”nti.
tika-s0404t:56_12: evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato avikampitacittatāya pathavīsamacittatanti attho.
tika-s0404t:56_13: Akuppadhammatanti ettha akuppadhammo nāma phalasamāpattīti keci vadanti.
tika-s0404t:56_14: “Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano pathavīsamacittatāya akuppanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo”ti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-s0404t:56_16: Brāhmaṇassa vuddhatāya āsannavuttimaraṇanti sambhāvanavasena “ajja maritvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:56_17: “Mahantena kho pana ussāhenā”ti sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena.
tika-s0404t:57_0: Pakkhe vidhunantāti patte cālentā. Nikkhamantānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, nikkhantesūti attho.
tika-s0404t:58_0: So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyoti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako,
tika-s0404t:58_4: Tibhūmapariyāpannāpi sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti
tika-s0404t:58_5: āha “avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū”ti aṇḍakosanti bījakapālaṃ.
tika-s0404t:58_6: Lokasannivāseti lokoyeva saṅgamma samāgamma nivāsanaṭṭhena lokasannivāso,
tika-s0404t:58_10: Tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sammāsambodhīti maggo vuccati.
tika-s0404t:58_14: saddo sundaravacanoti āha “atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi”nti.
tika-s0404t:59_3: Tisso vijjāti upanissayavato saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti.
tika-s0404t:59_4: Nanu cettha tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti?
tika-s0404t:59_6: Satipi āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ tisso vijjā
tika-s0404t:59_7: paripuṇṇā hontīti “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:59_10: Paccekabodhiñāṇanti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:59_14: Paṭivedhopi na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti āha “pattomhī”ti,
tika-s0404t:60_2: Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:60_3: evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha “yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe…
tika-s0404t:60_7: buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva “tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha,
tika-s0404t:60_12: Tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvoti ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso tikkhatā,
tika-s0404t:60_14: Tikkhopi hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti,
tika-s0404t:60_16: Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena kilesasamudācārasaṅkhobharahitatāya saddhindriyavasena pasannabhāvo,
tika-s0404t:60_17: satipi pasannabhāve antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena sūrabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:60_20: Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti.
tika-s0404t:60_21: Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvāti saṅkhārupekkhāya anantaraṃ sikhāppattaanulomavipassanāvasena maggavijāyanatthaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā.
tika-s0404t:61_0: Jeṭṭho seṭṭhoti vuddhatamattā jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi uttamattā pasatthatamoti seṭṭho.
tika-s0404t:62_1: vīriya”ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento āha “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:62_2: Tattha pubbabhāgato pabhutīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgīyavīriyārambhādito paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0404t:62_8: Sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso “bodhimaṇḍo”ti paññāto.
tika-s0404t:62_9: Paggahitanti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussahanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:62_12: Upaṭṭhitāti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpanabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0404t:62_14: Sammosassa viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti asammuṭṭhā.
tika-s0404t:62_17: tathāpi yasmā kāyappassaddhi uppajjamānā cittappassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā,
tika-s0404t:62_19: Kāyappassaddhiyā ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā vuttaṃ “rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:63_0: So ca khoti so ca kho kāyo.
tika-s0404t:63_2: Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti.
tika-s0404t:63_3: Sammā āhitanti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:63_6: sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha “ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana”nti.
tika-s0404t:63_8: Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya icchitabbāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0404t:63_9: sā pana nānantarikabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā.
tika-s0404t:63_11: paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā,
tika-s0404t:63_12: tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:63_13: Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:64_0: Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhāni nāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsaṃtveva gahitanti āha “kiṃ viditaṃ karoti?
tika-s0404t:64_2: Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo viya tamoti āha “sveva moho”ti.
tika-s0404t:64_7: Avijjā vihatāti etena vijānanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:64_8: Yasmā vijjā uppannā”ti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā.
tika-s0404t:64_9: Paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:64_10: Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvayeti iminā “tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:64_12: Kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ ātāpoti āha “vīriyātāpena ātāpino”ti,
tika-s0404t:64_15: Yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti aññassapi kassaci mādisassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:65_0: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitanti na paṭhamadutiyañāṇadvayādhigamaṃ viya kevalanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:66_0: Tikkhattuṃ jātoti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti – “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
tika-s0404t:66_1: paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuddho mahallako,
tika-s0404t:66_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jāto”ti.
tika-s0404t:66_3: Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇanti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya tabbhāvibhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:66_4: Tattha atītaṃsañāṇanti atītakkhandhāyatanadhātusaṅkhāte atīte koṭṭhāse appaṭihatañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:66_5: Dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇattā yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ca dibbacakkhuvaseneva
tika-s0404t:66_6: ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva ca ṭhitassa cetopariyañāṇasiddhito vuttaṃ
tika-s0404t:70_2: Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā “ettakā purato gacchantu,
tika-s0404t:70_3: ettakā pacchā”tiādinā tattha nisīditvā santhaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:70_6: Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca āgantvā yāva gehe gomayaparibhaṇḍādivasena paṭijagganaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:70_7: tāva ekaṃ dve divase te rājāno tattha santhambhantītipi santhāgāraṃ.
tika-s0404t:70_8: Tesaṃ rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi santhāgāraṃ.
tika-s0404t:70_10: tasmā uppannaṃ kiccaṃ ekassa vasena na sijjhati,
tika-s0404t:70_14: Yasmā vā tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0404t:70_15: imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”ntiādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti,
tika-s0404t:71_8: Satipi mahāpariccāgānaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesasabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca pañcamahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:73_1: Dvīhi kāraṇehi aniyyānikasāsane ṭhitā attano sāvakattaṃ upagate paggaṇhanti,
tika-s0404t:74_3: Tattha dānakathā tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā sukarattā sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā.
tika-s0404t:74_4: Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati,
tika-s0404t:74_6: Sīlena dāyakappaṭiggāhakavisuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato kiriyādhammaṃ vatvā akiriyādhammavacanato,
tika-s0404t:74_7: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā kathitā.
tika-s0404t:74_10: “Imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā
tika-s0404t:74_11: aparimeyyā dibbabhogasampattiyo laddhabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathā.
tika-s0404t:74_14: maggañca kathentena tadadhigamūpāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma
tika-s0404t:74_15: bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ādīnavo.
tika-s0404t:74_16: “Hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṃhitā”ti tesaṃ okāro lāmakabhāvo.
tika-s0404t:74_17: Sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha saṃkileso.
tika-s0404t:74_18: Sabbaso saṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti ayamattho maggantīti ettha iti-
tika-s0404t:75_0: Sukhānaṃ nidānanti diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ samparāyikānaṃ nibbānupasaṃhitānañcāti sabbesampi sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:75_5: Sampattīnaṃ mūlanti yā imā loke padesarajjasirissariyasattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo,
tika-s0404t:75_9: Bhogānanti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena “bhogo”ti laddhanāmānaṃ piyamanāpiyarūpādīnaṃ tannissayānaṃ vā upabhogasukhānaṃ patiṭṭhā niccalādhiṭṭhānatāya.
tika-s0404t:76_1: Evaṃ hissa mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānaṭṭho dīpito hoti.
tika-s0404t:76_3: Yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho,
tika-s0404t:76_4: evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave upapattiyā ṭhitiyā ca paccayoti āha “ālambanaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisa”nti.
tika-s0404t:76_17: Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena balavā hoti,
tika-s0404t:77_0: Idāni mahābodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ “dānaṃ nāmeta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:77_1: Tattha attānaṃ niyyātentenāti etena “dānaphalaṃ sammadeva passantā mahāpurisā attano jīvitampi pariccajanti,
tika-s0404t:77_2: tasmā ko nāma viññujātiko bāhire vatthusmiṃ pageva saṅgaṃ kareyyā”ti ovādaṃ deti.
tika-s0404t:77_3: Idāni yā lokiyā lokuttarā ca ukkaṃsagatā sampattiyo,
tika-s0404t:77_6: cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato cakkavattisampatti vuttā.
tika-s0404t:77_9: Tāsupi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamataṃ dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:77_10: Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
tika-s0404t:77_11: Eteneva tassa brahmasampattiyāpi paccayabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:78_0: Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:78_2: paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratīti aṭṭhānametanti āha “dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:78_4: Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0404t:78_5: Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthīti ettha “candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī”tiādikā gāthā –
tika-s0404t:78_7: kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā”tiādikā jātakagāthāyo ca āharitvā vattabbā.
tika-s0404t:78_8: Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca parassa dassanīyabhāvāvahañca.
tika-s0404t:79_0: Ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti idaṃ majjhimehi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenevāha sakko devarājā –
tika-s0404t:82_3: Taṃ pana tassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “niccamettha kīḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:83_2: Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo,
tika-s0404t:83_4: Tathā ca kāmā yathātathaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:84_7: nikkhantaṃ byāpādasaññāyā”tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi.
tika-s0404t:84_8: Pabbajjāyaṃ jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi.
tika-s0404t:84_9: Kallacittanti kammaniyacittaṃ heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā upari desanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamena kammakkhamacittaṃ.
tika-s0404t:84_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā assaddhiyādayo cittassa rogabhūtā,
tika-s0404t:84_22: Pasannacittanti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ adhimuttacittanti evamettha sesapadānaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:85_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena sīhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādanañca dasseti.
tika-s0404t:85_7: Etenassa lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhappaṭipadakhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti.
tika-s0404t:85_18: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-s0404t:85_21: udakena temetvā ūsagomayachārikakhārehi kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsinehena
tika-s0404t:85_22: temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho.
tika-s0404t:85_23: Tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:85_25: tena suddhavatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.
tika-s0404t:86_0: “Diṭṭhadhammo”ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti tannivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:86_1: Patti nāma ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:86_2: Sā panesā viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenapi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-s0404t:86_5: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:86_7: Tiṇṇā vicikicchāti sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā nittiṇṇā vicikicchā.
tika-s0404t:86_9: na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā.
tika-s0404t:86_10: Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ patto.
tika-s0404t:86_11: Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-s0404t:86_12: na cassa paro paccetabbo atthīti aparappaccayo.
tika-s0404t:87_0: Uddisitvā katanti attānaṃ uddisitvā māraṇavasena kataṃ nibbattitaṃ maṃsaṃ.
tika-s0404t:87_2: saddo kammasādhano atītakāliko cāti āha “attānaṃ paṭiccakata”nti.
tika-s0404t:87_5: Karaṇavasena paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ paṭiccakammaṃ yathā buddhi buddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:90_3: Tāni panassa sāṭheyyādīni kāyacittujukatāpaṭipakkhabhūtā lobhasahagatacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesā.
tika-s0404t:90_4: Tattha yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne ṭhātukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:90_5: purato gantvā tatheva sappaṭibhayaṭṭhāneva ṭhassāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:90_6: vañcanādhippāyabhāvato ṭhātukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nikhātatthambho viya cattāro pāde niccāletvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0404t:90_9: Tathā yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne nivattitvā khandhagataṃ pātetukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:90_10: purato gantvā tatheva pātessāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:90_15: kālena ujumaggeneva ca gantukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:90_16: purato gantvā tatheva evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:90_20: tathā leṇḍaṃ vā passāvaṃ vā vissajjetukāmassa idaṃ ṭhānaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:90_21: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:90_22: purato gantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne karissāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:90_25: Yassa pana kismiñci ṭhāne maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:90_26: purato gantvā tattheva evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:90_27: paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmaṭṭhāneyeva maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohati,
tika-s0404t:90_29: Iti imaṃ catubbidhampi kiriyaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “yāni kho panassa tāni sāṭheyyāni…pe…
tika-s0404t:93_1: Pañcame yā kāci pariyatti vā sippaṃ vā yasmā asajjhāyantassa ananuyuñjantassa vinassati,
tika-s0404t:93_4: Yasmā pana gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya jiṇṇappaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni akarontassa gharaṃ nāma vinassati,
tika-s0404t:93_6: Yasmā gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā kosajjavasena sarīrappajagganaṃ vā parikkhārappaṭijagganaṃ vā akarontassa kāyo dubbaṇṇo hoti,
tika-s0404t:93_8: Yasmā pana gāvo rakkhantassa pamādavasena niddāyantassa vā kīḷantassa vā tā gāvo atitthapakkhandanādīhi
tika-s0404t:93_9: vā vāḷamigacorādiupaddavena vā paresaṃ sālikkhettādīni otaritvā khādanavasena vā vināsamāpajjanti,
tika-s0404t:93_10: sayampi daṇḍaṃ vā paribhāsaṃ vā pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0404t:93_11: pabbajitaṃ vā pana chadvārādīni arakkhantaṃ pamādavasena kilesā otaritvā sāsanā cāventi,
tika-s0404t:94_3: akkhīhipi na daṭṭhabbā”ti taṃ mātāpitaropi nīharanti,
tika-s0404t:94_7: Yassa hi khettakasanakāle “imasmiṃ khette sampanne salākabhattādīni dassāmī”ti cintetvāpi nipphanne sasse maccheraṃ uppajjitvā cāgacittaṃ nivāreti,
tika-s0404t:94_14: Te pana idhaloke paraloke ca malameva.
tika-s0404t:97_1: Navame asurāti devā viya na suranti na kīḷanti na virocantīti asurā.
tika-s0404t:97_6: Te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādīni nimminitvā kīḷantā abhiramanti.
tika-s0404t:97_8: Ime guṇe disvāti āha “ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:98_1: himavā tattha patiṭṭhitasamuddadahapabbatā tappabhavā nadiyoti etesu yaṃ yaṃ na manussagocaraṃ,
tika-s0404t:98_3: tasmā tattha sammohavidhamanatthaṃ “ayaṃ tāva jambudīpo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:98_20: āyāmato pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:99_1: Supaṭiyattānīti tadupabhogisattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammunāva suṭṭhu paṭiyattāni susaṇṭhitāni honti.
tika-s0404t:99_5: Purimāni nāmagottānīti ettha nadī ninnagātiādikaṃ gottaṃ,
tika-s0404t:101_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0404t:101_1: Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena saṃvāsaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0404t:101_4: Sabbā hi sāsanasampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiatthā.
tika-s0404t:102_1: Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti,
tika-s0404t:105_0: Lokiyaratananibbattaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghati. Apica –
tika-s0404t:108_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:108_6: Āsannakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sātisayo.
tika-s0404t:109_2: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-s0404t:109_3: Tathā hi kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattasaññānaṃ pahānato asubhadukkhāniccānattabhāvaggahaṇato ca nesaṃ kāyānupassanādibhāvo vibhatto.
tika-s0404t:110_3: puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato sammappadhānaṃ vīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:110_4: Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanappahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanaṭṭhāpanavasena
tika-s0404t:111_2: Ijjhanti vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
tika-s0404t:111_3: Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādoti iddhipādo,
tika-s0404t:111_5: Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti iddhipādo.
tika-s0404t:111_6: Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0404t:111_7: Svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati,
tika-s0404t:112_1: Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:112_5: aññāṇaṃ abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññindriyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:113_0: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0404t:114_2: Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:114_8: Tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya.
tika-s0404t:114_9: Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:114_10: Tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
tika-s0404t:115_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā,
tika-s0404t:115_5: Mārento kilese gacchati nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati,
tika-s0404t:115_6: sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evametesaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:116_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito,
tika-s0404t:116_2: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannoti sotāpattiphalassa attapaccakkhakaraṇāya paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho,
tika-s0404t:116_4: Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho.
tika-s0404t:116_6: Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījītievamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo,
tika-s0404t:119_4: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhanti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci.
tika-s0404t:119_9: Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0404t:119_11: Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa dussīlassa cittaṃ passi.
tika-s0404t:119_12: Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:119_13: tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:119_14: Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī jānāti,
tika-s0404t:119_16: Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.
tika-s0404t:119_17: Diṭṭhosīti ayaṃ na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi.
tika-s0404t:119_19: tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso.
tika-s0404t:119_20: Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi,
tika-s0404t:120_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi “thero sayameva nibbinno oramissatī”ti vā,
tika-s0404t:120_1: “idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi.
tika-s0404t:120_2: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti “bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho,
tika-s0404t:120_6: mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ aggahesi,
tika-s0404t:120_8: Bahi dvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvāti dvārakoṭṭhakā dvārasālāto nikkhāmetvā.
tika-s0404t:120_16: parisā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0404t:120_17: evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessati,
tika-s0404t:121_3: na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:121_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti.
tika-s0404t:121_7: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni.
tika-s0404t:121_10: Tattha na dānāhanti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na karissāmi,
tika-s0404t:121_24: etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t:121_33: tasmā amhākampi bhagavā vīsativassamattaṃ imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.
tika-s0404t:121_36: Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:122_3: Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa anuddeso vutto,
tika-s0404t:122_4: so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehipi sattahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0404t:122_5: vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento
tika-s0404t:127_3: So hi rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:127_5: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato hatthako āḷavakoti jāto.
tika-s0404t:127_6: Tenāha “āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro”ti.
tika-s0404t:130_1: Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya suppaṭividdhā,
tika-s0404t:130_4: Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti “aṅgārakāsūpamā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0404t:133_1: Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṃ āvāhaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0404t:133_4: Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṃ petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova.
tika-s0404t:136_8: Santaguṇaniguhanenāti attani saṃvijjamānānaṃ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena.
tika-s0404t:136_10: No mahicchassāti mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato.
tika-s0404t:137_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikā,
tika-s0404t:137_1: sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa.
tika-s0404t:137_4: Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena “ayaṃ dhammo”ti vacanato.
tika-s0404t:137_8: katapaññāya hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇaṃ abhipattheti,
tika-s0404t:137_10: Mānādayo sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti papañcāti āha “taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:142_4: Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhakāmatārāgādayo viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ,
tika-s0404t:142_6: Nayidaṃ tādisaṃ vohārabhayādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ adāyako akārako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:142_7: Adāsi meti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ cintetvā dīyati,
tika-s0404t:142_11: Sāhu dānanti dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññattanti sādhusamācāre ṭhatvā deti.
tika-s0404t:142_13: Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti,
tika-s0404t:142_15: Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena paccanīkadhammavidūrīkaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya
tika-s0404t:142_16: ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:142_18: Muducitto hoti laddhā dāyake “iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato”ti,
tika-s0404t:143_0: Adantadamananti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti,
tika-s0404t:143_2: Adānaṃ dantadūsakanti adānaṃ pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti.
tika-s0404t:143_3: Unnamanti dāyakā piyaṃvadā ca paresaṃ garucittīkāraṭṭhānatāya.
tika-s0404t:144_0: Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya suparisuddhatāya guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca.
tika-s0404t:147_4: Ṭhapetīti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā upari tenevākārena pavattati,
tika-s0404t:147_11: Nippariyāyato uttari nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa labbhanatoti vuttaṃ “uttari abhāvitanti tato uparimaggaphalatthāya abhāvita”nti.
tika-s0404t:147_15: na dānamayassa puññassa kevalassa taṃsaṃvattanatādassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:147_22: Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kimatthiyanti āha “dānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:147_23: Dānena muducittoti baddhāghāte veripuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
tika-s0404t:150_2: attano santānaṃ punantīti vā puññāni ca tāni hetupaccayehi kattabbato kiriyā cāti puññakiriyā,
tika-s0404t:150_3: tāyeva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ piyamanāpatādiānisaṃsānaṃ vatthubhāvato puññakiriyavatthūni.
tika-s0404t:151_1: pūjāvasena vā attano deyyadhammassa parassa pariccāgacetanā dīyati etenāti dānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:151_6: rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā
tika-s0404t:151_7: somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu pavattacetanā dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-s0404t:152_0: Niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañca aṭṭha dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa “sīlapūraṇatthaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa,
tika-s0404t:152_1: manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā “pabbajito vatamhi sādhu suṭṭhū”ti āvajjentassa,
tika-s0404t:152_5: vīriyena ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlati,
tika-s0404t:153_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa, sotaṃ…pe…
tika-s0404t:153_10: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa yā cetanā,
tika-s0404t:153_11: yā ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu sabbāsu aṭṭhattiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pavattā jhānacetanā,
tika-s0404t:153_12: yā ca anavajjesu kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānesu paricayamanasikārādivasena pavattā cetanā,
tika-s0404t:153_13: sabbā sā bhāveti etāyāti bhāvanāmayaṃ vuttanayena puññakiriyavatthu cāti bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu.
tika-s0404t:154_0: Ekamekañcettha yathārahaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:154_2: Kāyaṅgaṃ vācaṅgañca acopetvā manasā cintayantassa manokammaṃ.
tika-s0404t:154_4: dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.
tika-s0404t:154_5: Yathā hi kevalaṃ “annadānādīni demī”ti dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti,
tika-s0404t:154_6: evaṃ “idaṃ dānamayaṃ sammāsambodhiyā paccayo hotū”ti dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā dānakālepi dānasīseneva pavattitattā.
tika-s0404t:154_7: Vattasīse ṭhatvā dadanto “etaṃ dānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃsahetu paveṇicāritta”nti cārittasīsena vā dento cārittasīlattā sīlamayaṃ.
tika-s0404t:154_8: Khayato vayato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.
tika-s0404t:154_9: Yathā hi deyyadhammapariccāgavasena vattamānāpi dānacetanā vattasīse ṭhatvā dadato sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu
tika-s0404t:154_10: hoti pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge cetanāya ca tathāpavattattā.
tika-s0404t:157_1: Sattame viceyya detīti ettha dve vicinanāni dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:157_3: Tesu vipannasīle ito bahiddhā pañcanavuti pāsaṇḍabhede ca dakkhiṇeyye pahāya sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sāsane
tika-s0404t:157_5: Lāmakalāmake paccaye apanetvā paṇītapaṇīte vicinitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t:160_8: Sabbaso kenacipi pakārena sādhūhi na kiṇṇāni na khittāni chaḍḍitānīti asaṃkiṇṇāni.
tika-s0404t:160_10: evaṃ etarahi anāgate cāti āha “asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni na saṃkiyanti na saṃkiyissantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:160_12: Na hi kadāci viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā hiṃsādipāpadhammaṃ anujānanti.
tika-s0404t:160_13: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ detīti sabbesu bhūtesu nihitadaṇḍattā sakalassapi sattakāyassa bhayābhāvaṃ deti.
tika-s0404t:165_5: Mahatī daddarī vīṇāvisesopi ātatamevāti “cammapariyonaddhesū”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:165_9: Sabbaso pariyonaddhaṃ nāma caturassaambaṇaṃ paṇavādi ca.
tika-s0404t:166_0: Bhattāraṃ nātimaññatīti sāmikaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ manasāpi na pattheti.
tika-s0404t:166_5: Idha parijano nāma sāmikassa ceva attano ca ñātijano.
tika-s0404t:169_2: Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati,
tika-s0404t:169_4: so idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato sadatthasampādanato ca.
tika-s0404t:169_6: (Pasaṃsāvahato tayidaṃ pasaṃsāvahanaṃ kittisaddena idhaloke saddānaṃ cittatosanaviddheyyabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0404t:169_7: ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.) Susaṃvihitakammantoti yāgubhattapacanakālādīni anatikkamitvā tassa tassa sādhukaṃ
tika-s0404t:169_10: Yo hi samparāyikaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati,
tika-s0404t:176_2: Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati,
tika-s0404t:176_5: cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
tika-s0404t:176_7: Tenāha “puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā”ti.
tika-s0404t:179_1: Taṃtaṃpalobhanakiriyā kāyavācāhi parakkamantiyo ukkaṇṭhantūti sāsanaṃ pesenti nāmāti katvā vuttaṃ “sāsanaṃ pesetvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:179_3: Anabhiratiṃ vinodetvāti itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ vokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanena anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā.
tika-s0404t:180_1: tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu kiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggitāti attho.
tika-s0404t:180_2: Posikāti divasassa dve tayo vāre nahāpetvā bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi.
tika-s0404t:180_3: Thaññaṃ pāyesīti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva daharo,
tika-s0404t:180_4: tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpatī attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi.
tika-s0404t:180_9: Tattha koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo.
tika-s0404t:180_10: Koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo,
tika-s0404t:180_12: Idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto,
tika-s0404t:181_0: Mātugāmassa pabbajitattāti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ aṭṭhatvā pañcasuyeva vassasatesu saddhammaṭṭhitiyā kāraṇanidassanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:181_1: Paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavavaseneva vuttanti ettha paṭisambhidāppattakhīṇāsavaggahaṇena jhānānipi gahitāneva honti.
tika-s0404t:181_2: Na hi nijjhānakānaṃ sabbappakārasampatti ijjhatīti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:182_5: Idhāpi sāsanantaradhānakathāyaṃ “buddhānañhi parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0404t:182_7: tato tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti,
tika-s0404t:182_8: gacchante gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti.
tika-s0404t:183_1: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,
tika-s0404t:183_3: Tato cha abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:183_4: Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
tika-s0404t:183_8: gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:183_10: tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva ācariyena tattha tattha dassitanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:184_1: Pariyattimūlakaṃ sāsananti āha “na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:187_1: Catutthe ekena bhoge bhuñjeyyāti ekena koṭṭhāsena bhoge bhuñjeyya,
tika-s0404t:187_3: Dvīhi kammanti dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ payojeyya.
tika-s0404t:187_6: Āpadāsu bhavissatīti kulānañhi na sabbakālaṃ ekasadisaṃ vattati,
tika-s0404t:187_8: tasmā evaṃ āpadāsu uppannāsu bhavissatīti ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ nidhāpeyyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:187_9: Imesu pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kusalaṃ kātabbanti?
tika-s0404t:187_11: Tato gaṇhitvā hi bhikkhūnampi kapaṇaddhikānampi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:187_15: nhāpitādīnaṃ vetanavasena ca viniyogopi upayogo eva.
tika-s0404t:191_1: Chaṭṭhe gabbhavāso idha uttarapadalopena gabbho vuttoti āha “gabbhoti gabbhavāso”ti.
tika-s0404t:194_1: Navame dānaṃ dadantānanti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dentānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:194_5: Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalanti ariyasaṅghe dinnaṃ vipphāraṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:199_6: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:199_7: Atha vā ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhitu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0404t:199_12: Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti.
tika-s0404t:200_2: Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati.
tika-s0404t:200_3: Taṃ pana ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ avisuddhameva hoti,
tika-s0404t:201_2: Parittavasenevāti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:201_4: Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:201_6: Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatīti ettha abhibhavanaṃ samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti
tika-s0404t:202_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti,
tika-s0404t:202_2: tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārāsevanāya ca vinā appanā hoti,
tika-s0404t:202_6: nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā,
tika-s0404t:202_7: tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:203_0: Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato,
tika-s0404t:203_1: samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:203_2: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “iminā panassa pubbabhogo kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:203_3: Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā “jhānasaññāyapī”ti vuttanti āha “abhibhavana…pe… atthī”ti.
tika-s0404t:204_1: na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhiṃ pāpitānīti tathāvaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato.
tika-s0404t:205_6: Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-s0404t:205_7: appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ āgatattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā
tika-s0404t:205_8: pana yathā suttante ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānītiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:205_9: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti codanaṃ katvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ
tika-s0404t:205_10: anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā “tattha vā idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
tika-s0404t:205_11: tasmā tāni niyamatova vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni,
tika-s0404t:205_12: ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:206_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni ca sabbāni “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0404t:206_3: tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyā”ti.
tika-s0404t:206_5: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni,
tika-s0404t:206_8: tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo atthīti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”tiādinā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho,
tika-s0404t:206_11: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
tika-s0404t:206_12: Sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni.
tika-s0404t:206_13: Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato “rūpī
tika-s0404t:206_14: rūpāni passatī”tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati.
tika-s0404t:206_15: “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā
tika-s0404t:206_20: Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:206_21: na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:207_0: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena
tika-s0404t:207_2: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce? Taṃ na.
tika-s0404t:207_4: Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā vā appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:207_6: Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti,
tika-s0404t:210_2: Sabhāvo hi ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyato ñātabbato “attho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:210_7: Etena satipi sabbassapi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena
tika-s0404t:210_8: taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato vimuccitvā pavattati,
tika-s0404t:210_12: tathā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatāya eva aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi vimokkho.
tika-s0404t:210_14: Ayaṃ panatthoti ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho pacchime vimokkhe nirodhe natthi.
tika-s0404t:211_1: taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena visiṭṭharūpaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:211_2: yena visiṭṭhena rūpena “rūpī”ti vucceyya rūpīsaddassa atisayatthadīpanato,
tika-s0404t:211_3: tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpassa vasena paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ idha paramatthato rūpibhāvasādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:212_0: Anto appanāyaṃ “subha”nti ābhogo natthīti iminā pubbābhogavasena tathā adhimutti siyāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:212_2: Yasmā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:212_3: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito.
tika-s0404t:212_4: Yasmā pana mettādivasena pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahanti,
tika-s0404t:212_7: Tayidaṃ ubhayampi tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:213_1: Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avasissati.
tika-s0404t:213_3: Uttamo vimokkho nāma ariyeheva samāpajjitabbato ariyaphalapariyosānattā diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattibhāvato ca.
tika-s0404t:219_8: Ādito tehi saddhiṃ satthu bhāsanaṃ ālāpo,
tika-s0404t:219_13: Tesanti padaṃ ubhayapadāpekkhaṃ “tesampi lakkhaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ viya satthu sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ tesaṃ kevalaṃ paññāyati evā”ti.
tika-s0404t:219_17: Bhāsantaranti tesaṃ sattānaṃ bhāsāto aññaṃ bhāsaṃ.
tika-s0404t:219_20: desetīti idaṃ nanu attānaṃ jānāpetvā dhamme kathite tesaṃ sātisayo pasādo hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ?
tika-s0404t:219_21: Yesaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva dhamme kathite pasādo hoti,
tika-s0404t:219_25: Evaṃ sutopīti evaṃ aviññātadesako aviññātāgamanopi suto dhammo attano dhammasudhammatāyeva anāgate paccayo hoti suṇantassa.
tika-s0404t:222_1: Dasame udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa āyatanabhāvena iṭṭhakāhi kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne.
tika-s0404t:222_6: Tathā hi sattambanti kikissa rañño dhītaro satta kumāriyo saṃvegajātā gehato nikkhamitvā tattha padhānaṃ padahiṃsu,
tika-s0404t:222_9: tasmiṃ adhivatthaṃ devataṃ bahū manussā putte patthenti,
tika-s0404t:222_13: iti sabbānevetāni buddhuppādato pubbadevatā pariggahetvā cetiyavohārena voharitāni,
tika-s0404t:222_15: Ramaṇīyāti ettha vesāliyā tāva bhūmibhāgasampattiyā sulabhapiṇḍatāya ramaṇīyabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:222_16: Vihārānaṃ pana nagarato nātidūratāya naccāsannatāya gamanāgamanasampattiyā anākiṇṇavihāraṭṭhānatāya chāyudakasampattiyā
tika-s0404t:223_1: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā.
tika-s0404t:223_2: Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0404t:223_5: Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisayatāya patiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā.
tika-s0404t:223_9: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya sikhāppattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
tika-s0404t:224_5: yo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavavisese purimasiddhabhavapatthanūpanissayavasena sarīrāvayavavaṇṇasaṇṭhānappamāṇādivisesā
tika-s0404t:224_8: So yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīnampi attano sahajātānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhapanākāravuttitāya pavattanakāni
tika-s0404t:224_9: rūpārūpajīvitindriyāni yasmā na kevalaṃ tesaṃ khaṇaṭhitiyā eva kāraṇabhāvena anupālakāni,
tika-s0404t:224_10: atha kho yāva bhavaṅgupacchedā anupabandhassa avicchedahetubhāvenapi,
tika-s0404t:224_13: Taṃ pana devānaṃ nerayikānaṃ uttarakurukānañca niyataparicchedaṃ.
tika-s0404t:224_18: tassa ca yathā purimasiddhabhavapatthanāvasena taṃtaṃgatinikāyādīsu vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesaniyamo siddho dassanānussavādīhi,
tika-s0404t:224_20: Evaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbattasattānaṃ yebhuyyena samappamāṇaṭṭhitikālaṃ dassanānussavehi labhitvā
tika-s0404t:224_21: taṃparamataṃ ajjhosāya pavattitabhavapatthanāvasena ādito paricchedaniyamo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:224_22: Yasmā pana kammaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu yathā taṃtaṃupapattiniyatavaṇṇādinibbattane samatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:224_23: evaṃ niyatāyuparicchedāsu upapattīsu paricchedātikkamena vipākanibbattane samatthaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0404t:224_24: tasmā vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:225_0: Mahāsīvatthero pana “mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0404t:225_1: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānañca āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva
tika-s0404t:225_3: Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatīti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto,
tika-s0404t:225_4: evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti.
tika-s0404t:225_6: kva ca nipatito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:226_1: Thūlasaññuppādanañhetaṃ “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalaṃ kappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya,
tika-s0404t:226_3: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:226_6: yadidaṃ pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:226_7: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0404t:226_9: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti.
tika-s0404t:226_11: ariyehi vā aññopi yo koci puthujjano.
tika-s0404t:226_12: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:226_13: evaṃ thero bhagavatā katanimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0404t:227_4: Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā,
tika-s0404t:227_8: aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā.
tika-s0404t:227_16: Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā.
tika-s0404t:227_17: Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci, ānanda,
tika-s0404t:227_18: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ.
tika-s0404t:227_19: Tathā pana pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0404t:227_21: Attano aparādhahetuto sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti,
tika-s0404t:227_23: Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti?
tika-s0404t:228_1: ānandāti yasmā divāvihāratthāya idhāgato, tasmā, ānanda,
tika-s0404t:228_5: virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:228_9: Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti namuci.
tika-s0404t:228_12: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato.
tika-s0404t:228_13: Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno sakkassa ca devarañño paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ
tika-s0404t:228_14: bhagavantaṃ ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ samatikkamāpessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā
tika-s0404t:228_19: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “parinibbātu dāni, bhante,
tika-s0404t:228_23: Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0404t:229_1: Tatheva vinītāti maggavaseneva kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā.
tika-s0404t:229_2: Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā,
tika-s0404t:229_3: sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho.
tika-s0404t:229_4: Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:229_5: taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena sutanti adhippetanti āha “tepiṭakavasenā”ti.
tika-s0404t:229_10: Tamevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena “suta”nti vuttaṃ, tameva.
tika-s0404t:229_12: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti.
tika-s0404t:229_13: Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:229_19: Anudhammanti tassā yathāvuttappaṭipadāya anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appichatādidhammaṃ.
tika-s0404t:229_24: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ.
tika-s0404t:230_10: Uttānīkarissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
tika-s0404t:230_12: saddo kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0404t:230_15: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti.
tika-s0404t:230_18: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
tika-s0404t:230_19: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni.
tika-s0404t:230_20: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:231_5: Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena abhiññāsampadāhi sāsanābhivuddhiyā matthakappattito.
tika-s0404t:231_14: Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
tika-s0404t:232_0: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito,
tika-s0404t:232_2: etassa avahanatthañhi cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0404t:232_4: Yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yatātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:232_5: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ tāva bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:232_8: ahampi visākhāpuṇṇamāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmīti evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā sabbabhāgena nicchayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:232_9: Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkhārakaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti vissajji.
tika-s0404t:232_10: Taṃvissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkhariyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ “na pavattessāmī”ti vissajji.
tika-s0404t:233_1: Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya bhūmicālassa mahantattaṃ dassetuṃ “tadā kira…pe…
tika-s0404t:233_3: Sā pana jābhikkhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva,
tika-s0404t:233_6: tadāpi tattikāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
tika-s0404t:233_9: Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tāvattakameva jātikkhettaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0404t:233_14: Udakapariyantaṃ katvā chappakārapavedhanena avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano,
tika-s0404t:233_18: atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsagato nigghosasaddo.
tika-s0404t:233_21: Tassa hi gajjabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā.
tika-s0404t:234_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0404t:234_1: idāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-s0404t:234_2: Evaṃ pana udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:235_3: Tathā hi taṃ parito khaṇḍitabhāvena “paritta”nti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:235_4: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0404t:235_5: Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato mahaggataṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:235_6: tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato arūpassa sātisayāni vijjantīti arūpāvacaraṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ itarañca “tula”nti.
tika-s0404t:235_7: Appavipākanti tīsupi kammesu yaṃ tanuvipākaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-s0404t:235_12: taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsupi bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:235_13: Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena vā appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:235_15: Niyakajjhattaratoti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena gocarāsevanāya ca nirato.
tika-s0404t:235_17: na ca taṃ kāmādibhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ “sambhava”nti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:235_19: Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0404t:236_4: “Tulento tīrento”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti.
tika-s0404t:236_5: Evantiādinā pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamavasena dasseti.
tika-s0404t:237_5: bahalanti idaṃ tassa vātassa ubbedhappamāṇameva gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:237_6: āyāmavitthārato pana dasasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇampi udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchindatiyeva.
tika-s0404t:237_8: Puna vātoti ukkhepakavāte tathā katvā vigate udakasandhārakavāto puna ābandhitvā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:237_11: Tato udakaṃ uggacchatīti tato ābandhitvā gahaṇato tena vātena uṭṭhāpitaṃ udakaṃ uggacchati upari gacchati.
tika-s0404t:237_14: Sakalā hi mahāpathavī tadā oggacchati ca uggacchati ca,
tika-s0404t:238_2: Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha “dubbalā”ti.
tika-s0404t:238_5: Sā hi thirā daḷhatarā hotīti āha “balavā”ti.
tika-s0404t:238_8: āposaññāya pana subhāvitāya pathavīkampo sukheneva ijjhatīti ayamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:238_9: Saṃvejento vā dibbasampattiyā pamattaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:238_10: vīmaṃsanto vā tāvadeva samadhigataṃ attano iddhibalaṃ.
tika-s0404t:238_11: So kirāyasmā khuragge arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
tika-s0404t:238_12: “atthi nu kho koci bhikkhu yena pabbajitadivaseyeva arahattaṃ patvā vejayanto pāsādo kampitapubbo”ti.
tika-s0404t:238_13: Tato “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā “ahaṃ kampessāmī”ti abhiññābalena vejayantamatthake ṭhatvā pādena paharitvā kampetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0404t:238_16: tvaṃ pūtigandheneva sīsena vejayantaṃ kampetuṃ icchasi,
tika-s0404t:239_0: Sāmaṇero “imā devatā mayā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:239_2: kahaṃ nu kho me ācariyo sāmuddikamahānāgatthero”ti āvajjetvā “mahāsamudde udakaleṇaṃ māpetvā divāvihāraṃ
tika-s0404t:239_3: nisinno”ti ñatvā tattha gantvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0404t:239_13: kapallapūvaṃ paccantaṃ antantena paricchinnanti iminā opammena jānāhī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:239_15: ettakenā”ti vatvā “pāsādena patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya vejayantābhimukho agamāsi.
tika-s0404t:239_19: Sakko devarājā “mā mayhaṃ puttena saddhiṃ kathayittha,
tika-s0404t:239_20: idāni tena ācariyo laddho khaṇena pāsādaṃ kampessatī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:239_27: Sāmaṇero pāsādaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāsādamatthake ṭhatvā udānaṃ udānesi –
tika-s0404t:246_2: yadā bodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhī”ti,
tika-s0404t:246_5: yadā bodhisatto mātukucchimhā nikkhamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhī”ti
tika-s0404t:246_6: ca mahāsattassa gabbhokkantiyaṃ abhijātiñca dhammatāvasena mahāpadāne pathavīkampassa vuttattā itaresupi
tika-s0404t:246_7: catūsu ṭhānesu pathavīkampo dhammatāvasenevāti atthato vuttametanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:247_0: Idāni nesaṃ pathavīkampānaṃ kāraṇato pavattiākārato ca vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “iti imesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:247_8: Sādhukāradānavasenāti yathā anaññasādhāraṇappaṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī abhisambodhiyaṃ kampittha,
tika-s0404t:247_9: evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena desanāñāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī kampittha,
tika-s0404t:247_10: taṃ panassā sādhukāradānaṃ viya hotīti “sādhukāradānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:248_2: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho attano attabhāvasaññitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhapetuṃ samatthopi
tika-s0404t:248_6: Taṃ panassā kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā viya hotīti vuttaṃ “kāruññabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0404t:249_0: Yasmā bhagavā parinibbānasamaye catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajji,
tika-s0404t:249_1: antarantarā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena tassa pubbabhāge sātisayaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ vipassanāñāṇañca pavattesi.
tika-s0404t:249_2: “Yadatthañca mayā evaṃ sucirakālaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo paramukkaṃsagato ñāṇasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0404t:249_4: tassa vata me sikhāppattaphalabhūtā accantaniṭṭhā anupādisesaparinibbānadhātu ajja samijjhatī”ti bhiyyo
tika-s0404t:249_5: ativiya somanassappattassa bhagavato pītivipphārādiguṇavipulatarānubhāvo parehi asādhāraṇañāṇātisayo udapādi,
tika-s0404t:249_6: yassa samāpattibalasamupabrūhitassa ñāṇātisayassa ānubhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā”tiādi,
tika-s0404t:249_8: taṃ panassā tassaṃ velāyaṃ ārodanākārappatti viya hotīti “aṭṭhamo ārodanenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:250_2: Pathavīdevatāya vasenāti ettha samuddadevatā viya mahāpathaviyā adhidevatā kira nāma atthi,
tika-s0404t:250_3: tādise kāraṇe sati tassā cittavasena ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
tika-s0404t:250_6: tathā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ abhisambodhiatthaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinnassa lokanāthassa antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamituṃ –
tika-s0404t:253_0: Vacanasamanantaraṃ mahāpathavī bhijjitvā saparisaṃ māraṃ parivattesi.
tika-s0404t:253_3: dhammatāvasena pana vuttanayena siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0404t:253_5: so puññadhammassa vā ñāṇadhammassa vā ānubhāvasabhāvoti.
tika-s0404t:257_0: Ayaṃ pana mahāpathavī aparesupi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu akampittha mahābhinikkhamane bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamane paṃsukūlaggahaṇe
tika-s0404t:257_3: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe “dvisahassadīpaparivāre nāma cattāro mahādīpe pahāya pabbajitvā susānaṃ gantvā paṃsukūlaṃ
tika-s0404t:257_4: gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ bhagavatā kata”nti acchariyavegābhihatā akampittha.
tika-s0404t:257_7: Brahmajāle pana dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu vijaṭetvā niggumbaṃ katvā desiyamānesu sādhukāradānavasena akampitthāti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:258_0: Na kevalañca etesuyeva ṭhānesu pathavī akampittha,
tika-s0404t:258_1: atha kho tīsu saṅgahesupi mahāmahindattherassa imaṃ dīpaṃ āgantvā jotivane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desitadivasepi akampittha.
tika-s0404t:258_2: Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre ca piṇḍapātiyattherassa cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā tattheva nisīditvā buddhārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:258_3: pītiṃ gahetvā imaṃ suttantaṃ āraddhassa suttapariyosāne udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
tika-s0404t:258_6: Tesaṃ sajjhāyapariyosānepi udakapariyantameva katvā pathavī akampittha.
tika-s0404t:259_1: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti kasmā aṭṭheva hetū vuttāti?
tika-s0404t:259_3: Imeyeva hi aṭṭha hetū niyamanti, nāññe.
tika-s0404t:259_4: Te hi kadāci sambhavantīti aniyamabhāvato na gaṇitā.
tika-s0404t:260_2: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyāti.
tika-s0404t:260_3: Yaṃ vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,
tika-s0404t:260_4: tañca pana akālikaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:261_4: Yadi te muñcitvā añño megho pavassati,
tika-s0404t:261_5: na so megho gaṇīyati sammatehi meghehi,
tika-s0404t:261_8: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,
tika-s0404t:261_9: akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:262_1: himavantā pabbatā pañca nadisatāni sandanti, tesaṃ, mahārāja,
tika-s0404t:262_2: pañcannaṃ nadisatānaṃ daseva nadiyo nadigaṇanāya gaṇīyanti.
tika-s0404t:262_12: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,
tika-s0404t:262_13: akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:263_1: rañño satampi dvisatampi tisatampi amaccā honti,
tika-s0404t:263_14: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,
tika-s0404t:263_15: akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:268_8: Vināpi hi bhāvajotanasaddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti,
tika-s0404t:268_13: Taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe kāyikantipi vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “duvidhampī”ti.
tika-s0404t:268_18: Yasmā māsā tintā visesena garukā honti,
tika-s0404t:269_1: Imināva nayenāti iminā kusītavatthūsu vutteneva nayena “duvidhampi vīriyaṃ ārabhatī”tiādinā.
tika-s0404t:269_4: “evaṃ bhāvanāya abbhussahanaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārambhavatthū”tiādinā ca attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:269_5: Yathā tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ abbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:269_6: Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇasahitāni hi abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha ārambhavatthūnīti veditabbāni.
tika-s0404t:283_3: Bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ upaṭṭhākā anibaddhā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0404t:283_12: Tenāha “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:284_2: Pāsādikanti aviraḷarukkhatāya siniddhapattatāya ca passantānaṃ pasādaṃ āvahatīti pāsādikaṃ.
tika-s0404t:284_3: Sandacchāyatāya manuññabhūmibhāgatāya ca anto paviṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajananaṭṭhena cittaṃ rametīti ramaṇīyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:284_7: Yasmā so padhānakamme yutto padhānakammiko nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:284_10: Therena kira pubbe taṃ ṭhānaṃ anuppaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni raññā eva satā anubhūtapubbaṃ uyyānaṃ ahosi,
tika-s0404t:284_11: tenassa diṭṭhamatteyeva tattha viharituṃ cittaṃ nami.
tika-s0404t:285_0: Yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatīti añño kocipi bhikkhu mama santikaṃ yāva āgacchati,
tika-s0404t:285_5: Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā
tika-s0404t:285_6: abhisambodhiyā vā adhigatattā tato aññaṃ uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0404t:285_7: Catūsu saccesu catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ katattāti idaṃ pana maggavasena labbhabhānaṃ bhedaṃ anupekkhitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:285_8: Atthi katassa paṭicayoti mayhaṃ santāne nipphāditassa sīlādidhammassa ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā tadatthaṃ puna vaḍḍhanasaṅkhāto paṭicayo atthi,
tika-s0404t:286_0: Tividhanāṭakaparivāroti mahantitthiyo majjhimitthiyo atitaruṇitthiyoti evaṃ vadhūkumārikakaññāvatthāhi tividhāhi nāṭakitthīhi parivuto.
tika-s0404t:286_2: Apare pana “tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe pupphaphalapallavādīsu lobhavasena kāmavitakko,
tika-s0404t:286_6: vanacarake tattha tattha disvā tesu cittadubbhanena byāpādavitakko,
tika-s0404t:286_7: tesaṃ viheṭhanādhippāyena vihiṃsāvitakko tassa uppajjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:286_8: Yathā tathā vā tassa micchāvitakkappavattiyeva acchariyakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:286_11: Yathā āyasmā ānando bhagavato valiyagattaṃ disvā avoca “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ,
tika-s0404t:286_14: Attani garumhi ca ekattepi bahuvacanaṃ dissati.
tika-s0404t:286_16: Kasmā panassa bhagavā tattha gamanaṃ anujāni?
tika-s0404t:286_18: paricārakāmatāya maññe bhagavā gantuṃ na detīti cassa siyā aññathattaṃ,
tika-s0404t:286_19: tadassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti anujāni.
tika-s0404t:287_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā nisinne athassa bhagavā sappāyadhammaṃ desento “aparipakkāya, meghiya,
tika-s0404t:287_4: Pubbabhāge hi tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca cetaso vimutti hoti,
tika-s0404t:287_8: Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite sodhite vipassanāya maggagabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyā paripākaṃ
tika-s0404t:289_2: pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t:290_2: sammappadhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t:291_2: satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi satindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t:292_2: jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t:293_2: gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t:294_2: pañca suttante paccavekkhato imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:295_0: Aparehipi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhanti.
tika-s0404t:295_13: Tesu veneyyadamanakusalo satthā veneyyassa meghiyattherassa ajjhāsayavasena idha kalyāṇamittatādayo vimuttiparipācanīye
tika-s0404t:295_14: dhamme dassento “pañca dhammā paripakkāya saṃvattantī”ti vatvā te vitthārento “idha, meghiya,
tika-s0404t:296_0: Tattha kalyāṇamittoti kalyāṇo bhaddo sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto.
tika-s0404t:296_1: Yassa sīlādiguṇasampanno “aghassa tātā hitassa vidhātā”ti evaṃ sabbākārena upakāro mitto hoti,
tika-s0404t:296_3: Yathāvuttehi kalyāṇapuggaleheva sabbiriyāpathesu saha ayati pavattati,
tika-s0404t:296_5: Kalyāṇapuggalesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena pavattatīti kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
tika-s0404t:296_7: Ayaṃ kalyāṇamittatāsaṅkhāto brahmacariyavāsassa ādibhāvato sabbesañca kusaladhammānaṃ bahukāratāya padhānabhāvato
tika-s0404t:296_8: ca imesu pañcasu dhammesu ādito vuttattā paṭhamo anavajjadhammo avisuddhānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena
tika-s0404t:296_10: Ettha ca kalyāṇamittassa bahukāratā padhānatā ca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0404t:296_11: brahmacariyassa yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti vadantaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ “mā hevaṃ,
tika-s0404t:297_0: Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ dhammajātaṃ.
tika-s0404t:297_14: Tayidaṃ pāripūrito atisayato vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti sīlavā,
tika-s0404t:298_4: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:298_11: Ācāragocarasampannoti heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa upari visesānaṃ yogassa ca upakāradhammaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:299_1: kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
tika-s0404t:299_3: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegukkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī.
tika-s0404t:299_4: Maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīlo vā pātī,
tika-s0404t:300_0: Atha vā avijjādihetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti.
tika-s0404t:300_1: “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:300_2: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:301_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ.
tika-s0404t:301_4: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti,
tika-s0404t:302_5: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro.
tika-s0404t:302_7: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:302_11: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
tika-s0404t:302_13: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0404t:303_5: samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:303_7: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho.
tika-s0404t:303_11: Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgova yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato.
tika-s0404t:303_15: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāva ettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:304_2: Atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā ca,
tika-s0404t:304_5: “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato sampanno samannāgato,
tika-s0404t:305_1: Ācāragocarasampannoti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā kāyiko avītikkamo,
tika-s0404t:305_3: kāyikavācasiko avītikkamoti evaṃ vuttabhikkhu sāruppaācārasampattiyā vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ
tika-s0404t:306_0: Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho
tika-s0404t:306_1: supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena iriyāpathasampanno
tika-s0404t:306_2: indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyaṃ anuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho
tika-s0404t:306_3: pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati,
tika-s0404t:307_9: yassa ca anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
tika-s0404t:308_0: Yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassī saṃvuto gacchati,
tika-s0404t:309_6: Tattha upanissayagocarassa pubbe vuttattā itaresaṃ vasenettha gocaro veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:309_7: Iti yathāvuttāya ācārasampattiyā imāya ca gocarasampattiyā samannāgatattā ācāragocarasampanno.
tika-s0404t:310_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakattā aṇuppamāṇesu assatiyā asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo.
tika-s0404t:310_1: Yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatarājasadisaṃ katvā passati,
tika-s0404t:310_2: yopi sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati,
tika-s0404t:310_4: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:310_5: taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati,
tika-s0404t:311_2: Cetovivaraṇasappāyāti cetaso paṭicchādakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovivaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā,
tika-s0404t:311_3: samathavipassanācittasseva vā vivaraṇāya pākaṭīkaraṇāya vā sappāyā upakārikāti cetovivaraṇasappāyā.
tika-s0404t:312_0: Idāni yena nibbidādiāvahaṇena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ca nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:312_3: Virāgāya nirodhāyāti tasseva virajjanatthāya ca nirujjhanatthāya ca.
tika-s0404t:312_8: Etesu hi ādito tīhi padehi vipassanā vuttā,
