tika-s0404t:312_10: Samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sijjhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:313_6: Tesu attanā yathāladdhena lābhena atitto uparūpari lābhaṃ icchanto atriccho nāma.
tika-s0404t:316_0: Icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti. ca;
tika-s0404t:318_1: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idhekacco assaddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-s0404t:318_2: dussīlo samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchatī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:319_1: yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-s0404t:319_2: sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchatī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:319_3: Duttappiyatāya hissa vijātamātāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:322_0: Ete pana atricchatādayo dose ārakā vivajjetvā santaguṇaniguhanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññū appiccho.
tika-s0404t:322_1: Attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno “saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati, sīlavā,
tika-s0404t:322_6: paññavā samāno “paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati.
tika-s0404t:322_10: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayadāyakaṃ deyyadhammaṃ attano thāmañca oloketvā sacepi hi deyyadhammo bahu hoti,
tika-s0404t:322_19: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
tika-s0404t:322_22: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana attani atthibhāvaṃ na jānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgappiccho.
tika-s0404t:322_23: Yo attano bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
tika-s0404t:322_25: Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sabrahmacārīnampi attano sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,
tika-s0404t:322_28: tassā saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokārānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena sappaṭipakkhassa atricchatādibhedassa
tika-s0404t:322_29: icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā appicchakathā.
tika-s0404t:323_0: Santuṭṭhikathāti ettha santuṭṭhīti sakena attanā laddhena tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi.
tika-s0404t:323_1: Atha vā visamaṃ paccayicchaṃ pahāya samaṃ tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi,
tika-s0404t:326_0: Sammā vā ñāyena bhagavatā anuññātavidhinā paccayehi tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi,
tika-s0404t:327_1: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
tika-s0404t:327_6: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
tika-s0404t:327_8: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:327_11: so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ,
tika-s0404t:327_12: idaṃ gilānānaṃ dubbalānaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotū”ti tesaṃ datvā attanā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā
tika-s0404t:327_13: saṅghāṭiṃ katvā tesaṃ vā purāṇacīvarāni gahetvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:328_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
tika-s0404t:328_6: lūkhaṃ paṇītaṃ pakativiruddhaṃ byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā gāḷhaṃ vā rogābādhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0404t:328_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:328_10: so “ayaṃ piṇḍapāto cirapabbajitānaṃ anurūpo”ti cīvaraṃ viya tesaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ attanā piṇḍāya
tika-s0404t:328_11: caritvā missakāhāraṃ vā bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:329_0: Idha pana bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti manāpaṃ vā āmanāpaṃ vā antamaso tiṇasanthārakampi,
tika-s0404t:329_5: Atha pana ābādhiko hoti dubbalo vā,
tika-s0404t:329_6: pakativiruddhaṃ vā so byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
tika-s0404t:329_8: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:329_10: Aparo sundaraṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati “paṇītasenāsanaṃ nāma pamādaṭṭhāna”nti,
tika-s0404t:329_11: mahāpuññatāya vā leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati,
tika-s0404t:329_12: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:330_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
tika-s0404t:330_5: Atha pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
tika-s0404t:330_7: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telena bhesajjaṃ katvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:330_10: so taṃ cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatakena yena kenaci bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-s0404t:330_13: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno “sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
tika-s0404t:330_16: tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanaṃ anussaranto catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:331_0: So evaṃpabhedo sabbopi santoso santuṭṭhīti pavuccati.
tika-s0404t:331_2: Tassā santuṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā ānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena tappaṭipakkhassa atricchatādibhedassa
tika-s0404t:331_3: icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā santuṭṭhikathā.
tika-s0404t:332_13: evaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu sabbakiccesu gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivittavāso kāyaviveko nāma.
tika-s0404t:333_5: Tesu idhekacco bhikkhu suṇāti “amukasmiṃ ṭhāne gāme vā nigame vā itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti,
tika-s0404t:333_11: apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ,
tika-s0404t:333_16: Disvā pana aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppanno kilesasanthavo samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
tika-s0404t:333_18: Attano pana santakaṃ yaṃ kiñci mātugāmassa datvā adatvā vā tena dinnassa vanabhaṅginiyādino paribhogavasena
tika-s0404t:334_0: Yopi cesa “gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikena saṃsaggena sahasokī sahanandī sukhitesu sukhito dukkhitesu
tika-s0404t:334_1: dukkhito uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vo yogaṃ āpajjatī”ti evaṃ vutto ananulomiko gihisaṃsaggo nāma,
tika-s0404t:334_3: taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya yvāyaṃ saṃsāre thirataraṃ saṃvegasaṅkhāresu tibbaṃ bhayasaññaṃ sarīre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ
tika-s0404t:334_4: sabbākusalesu jigucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ hirottappaṃ sabbakiriyāsu satisampajaññanti sabbaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0404t:335_12: So sabbopi yo bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0404t:335_14: nisajjāya uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0404t:335_15: tattha tattheva ajapadena daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya
tika-s0404t:335_16: paharanto viya sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti,
tika-s0404t:336_4: Vipassanāya pādakabhūtā saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi,
tika-s0404t:336_14: Apare pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttīnampi vasenettha atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇenti.
tika-s0404t:336_16: Iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-s0404t:337_1: appiccha kathañca paresaṃ kattā”ti “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
tika-s0404t:337_2: itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti ca ādivacanato sayañca appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi
tika-s0404t:337_4: Yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:338_2: sabbakālaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto.
tika-s0404t:339_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyāti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya.
tika-s0404t:339_2: Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:340_1: Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā.
tika-s0404t:340_2: Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya niddosāya.
tika-s0404t:340_4: Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanato “dukkhakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā nayena gacchantiyā.
tika-s0404t:340_5: Imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t:340_14: “sīlavā bhavissatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ,
tika-s0404t:340_15: tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ,
tika-s0404t:340_16: avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:341_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā
tika-s0404t:341_1: tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā sakalaṃ sāsanasampadaṃ dassetvā idānissa
tika-s0404t:341_2: tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati,
tika-s0404t:341_3: tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ pakāsetvā tato paraṃ arahattassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto “tena ca pana, meghiya,
tika-s0404t:341_4: bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:341_8: tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.
tika-s0404t:342_0: Asubhāti ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā.
tika-s0404t:342_6: Byāpādassa pahānāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannassa kopassa pajahanatthāya.
tika-s0404t:343_0: Aniccasaññinoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto tāvakālikato niccappaṭikkhepato ca “sabbe
tika-s0404t:343_2: Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato suññato ca “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
tika-s0404t:343_3: evaṃ pavattaanattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā citte saṇṭhahati atidaḷhaṃ patiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0404t:343_4: Aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:343_5: Tīsu lakkhaṇesu hi ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:343_8: Anattalakkhaṇe sudiṭṭhe “asmī”ti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova hotīti āha “anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-s0404t:343_9: Diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0404t:343_11: vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:346_2: buddho sahasā apavisitvā yāva sā kathā niṭṭhāti,
tika-s0404t:346_8: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha rāgo mānasaṃ.
tika-s0404t:346_11: kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ.
tika-s0404t:349_2: Samudānetabbāti sammā ñāyena anavajjauñchācariyādinā uddhamuddhamānetabbā pāpuṇitabbā.
tika-s0404t:349_3: Te pana samudānitā samāhatā nāma hontīti āha “samāharitabbā”ti.
tika-s0404t:349_6: Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā”ti.
tika-s0404t:349_19: Taṃ puggalanti so puggaloti paccattavacanaṃ upayogavasena pariṇāmetvā taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho.
tika-s0404t:349_22: Evarūpoti yaṃ nissāya bhikkhuno guṇehi vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā,
tika-s0404t:352_1: Sattame abhabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇantiādi desanāsīsameva,
tika-s0404t:352_5: khīṇāsavo pana pāsaṃso kunthakipillikaghātādīnipi na karotīti.
tika-s0404t:352_6: Sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitunti yathā gihibhūto sannidhiṃ katvā vatthukāme paribhuñjati,
tika-s0404t:352_7: evaṃ tilataṇḍulasappinavanītādīni sannidhiṃ katvā idāni paribhuñjituṃ abhabboti attho.
tika-s0404t:352_8: Vatthukāme pana nidahitvā paribhuñjantā tannissitaṃ kilesakāmampi nidahitvā paribhuñjanti nāmāti āha “vatthukāmakilesakāme”ti.
tika-s0404t:352_9: Nanu ca khīṇāsavasseva vasanaṭṭhāne tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantīti?
tika-s0404t:352_10: Na pana te attano atthāya nidhenti,
tika-s0404t:352_17: Seyyāthāpi pubbe agāriyabhūtoti yathā pubbe gihibhūto paribhuñjati,
tika-s0404t:352_19: Agāramajjhe vasantā hi sotāpannādayo yāvajīvaṃ gihibyañjanena tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:352_20: Khīṇāsavo pana arahattaṃ patvāva manussabhūto parinibbāti vā pabbajati vā.
tika-s0404t:352_21: Cātumahārājikādīsu kāmāvacaradevesu muhuttampi na tiṭṭhati. Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:352_23: Bhummadevattabhāve pana ṭhito arahattaṃ patvāpi tiṭṭhati vivekaṭṭhānasambhavā.
tika-s0404t:357_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame avāpurenti vivaranti dvāraṃ etenāti avāpuraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:357_6: usabho ca so chinnavisāṇo cāti usabhachinnavisāṇo.
tika-s0404t:357_9: Kaṇṭhe āsattenāti kenacideva paccatthikena ānetvā kaṇṭhe baddhena,
tika-s0404t:357_13: Evañhi so kāraṇe desiyamāne tato vigato nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:360_0: 12. Dutiye bhavassa appamattakatā nāma ittarakālatāyāti āha “accharāsaṅghātamattampī”ti.
tika-s0404t:366_1: Catutthe samiddhīti therassa kira attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko,
tika-s0404t:369_1: Pañcame mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena sambhūtassa.
tika-s0404t:369_7: pacchimehi atthaṅgamoti evaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa vaḍḍhiparihāninibbattibhedā dassitā.
tika-s0404t:372_2: Parittehi sakuṇḍehi taṇḍulehipi saddhiṃ vipakkabhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:372_4: biḷaṅgato nibbattanato tadeva kañjiyato jātanti kañjiyaṃ,
tika-s0404t:372_10: Deyyadhammaṃ asakkaronto hi uttaṇḍulādidosasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ deti,
tika-s0404t:372_12: Puggalaṃ asakkaronto nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ asammajjitvā yattha tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā dārakaṃ pesetvā deti.
tika-s0404t:372_17: Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipatti cittīkaraṇaṃ sambhāvanakiriyā,
tika-s0404t:372_20: Yo hi chaḍḍetukāmo hutvā rogino sarīre odanādīni majjitvā vammike rogaṃ pakkhipanto viya deti,
tika-s0404t:372_22: Anāgamanadiṭṭhikoti “addhā imassa dānassa phalaṃ mama āgacchatī”ti evaṃ yassa kammassakatadiṭṭhi atthi,
tika-s0404t:372_25: phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ hutvā na detīti attho.
tika-s0404t:373_2: Jātigottarūpabhogādiguṇānaṃ velā mariyādā natthi etasminti velāmo.
tika-s0404t:373_3: Atha vā yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ velā mariyādā amati osānaṃ gacchati etasminti velāmo,
tika-s0404t:373_4: velaṃ vā mariyādaṃ amati gacchati atikkamatīti velāmo.
tika-s0404t:373_13: Dukūlasandanānīti rajatabhājanādinissite dukūle khīrassa sandanaṃ etesanti dukūlasandanāni.
tika-s0404t:374_2: Saraṇaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññaṃ sabbasampattiṃ deti,
tika-s0404t:374_4: “sace tvaṃ yathā gahitaṃ saraṇaṃ na bhindissasi,
tika-s0404t:374_5: evāhaṃ taṃ māremī”ti yadipi koci tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0404t:374_8: saṅghaṃ na saṅghoti vadāmī”ti daḷhataraṃ katvā gahitassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:374_11: Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitadānādinihitadaṇḍatāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇādhiṭṭhānato cassa mahapphalamahānisaṃsatā veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:375_2: So ca na sakalo godohanakkhaṇo adhippetoti dassetuṃ “gāviyā ekavāraṃ thanaañchanamatta”nti attho vutto.
tika-s0404t:375_4: Gāviyā thanaṃ gahetvā ekakhīrabinduduhanakālamattampi gadduhanamattanti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:375_5: Ettakampi hi kālaṃ yo vasanagabbhapariveṇavihārūpacāraparicchedena vā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte hitapharaṇaṃ mettacittaṃ bhāvetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:380_3: Tesaṃ kira “ayaṃ mayhaṃ bhariyā”ti mamattaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0404t:380_4: mātaraṃ vā bhaginiṃ vā disvā chandarāgo na uppajjati.
tika-s0404t:380_5: Dhammatāsiddhassa sīlassa ānubhāvena putte diṭṭhamatte eva mātuthanato thaññaṃ paggharati,
tika-s0404t:380_6: tena saññāṇena nesaṃ mātari puttassa mātusaññā,
tika-s0404t:380_7: mātu ca putte puttasaññā paccupaṭṭhitāti keci.
tika-s0404t:381_0: Apicettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:381_1: Tattha kira tesu tesu padesesu ghananicitapattasañchannasākhāpasākhā kūṭāgārasamā manoramā rukkhā tesaṃ manussānaṃ nivesanakiccaṃ sādhenti.
tika-s0404t:381_3: aññepi tattha rukkhā sujātā sabbadāpi pupphitaggā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:381_4: Jalāsayāpi vikasitakamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādipupphasañchannā sabbakālaṃ paramasugandhaṃ samantato pavāyantā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:381_5: Sarīrampi tesaṃ atidīghādidosarahitaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ jarāya anabhibhūtattā valitapalitādidosavirahitaṃ
tika-s0404t:381_7: Anuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvitāya na ca nesaṃ kasivaṇijjādivasena āhārapariyeṭṭhivasena dukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-s0404t:381_10: Yathā nāmettha gimhānaṃ pacchime māse paccūsavelāyaṃ samasītuṇho utu hoti,
tika-s0404t:381_11: evameva sabbakālaṃ tattha samasītuṇhova utu hoti,
tika-s0404t:381_12: na ca nesaṃ koci upaghāto vihesā vā uppajjati.
tika-s0404t:381_13: Akaṭṭhapākimeva sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ suddhaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulapphalaṃ paribhuñjanti.
tika-s0404t:381_14: Taṃ bhuñjantānaṃ nesaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, gaṇḍo, kilāso, soso, kāso, sāso, apamāro,
tika-s0404t:381_15: jaroti evamādiko na koci rogo uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:381_16: na ca te khujjā vā vāmanā vā kāṇā vā kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkhahatā vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā vā honti.
tika-s0404t:383_0: Sattāhikameva ca tattha itthipurisā kāmaratiyā viharanti.
tika-s0404t:383_5: Rattakañcukato kañcanapaṭimā viya dārakā mātukucchito amakkhitā eva semhādinā sukheneva nikkhamanti.
tika-s0404t:384_0: Mātā pana puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā vijāyitvā te vicaraṇakappadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā yathāruci gacchati.
tika-s0404t:384_1: Tesaṃ tattha sayitānaṃ ye passanti purisā vā itthiyo vā,
tika-s0404t:384_5: Evaṃ pana vaḍḍhentā katipayadivaseheva laddhabalā hutvā dārikā itthiyo upagacchanti,
tika-s0404t:384_7: Kapparukkhato eva ca tesaṃ tattha vatthābharaṇāni nipphajjanti.
tika-s0404t:384_8: Nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittāni hi sukhumāni mudusukhasamphassāni vatthāni tattha tattha kapparukkhesu olambantāni tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:384_12: Tattha bahū phalarukkhā kumbhamattāni phalāni phalanti madhurarasāni,
tika-s0404t:384_13: yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāhampi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti.
tika-s0404t:385_0: Najjopi tattha suvisuddhajalā suppatitthā ramaṇīyā akaddamā vālukatalā nātisītā naccuṇhā surabhigandhīhi
tika-s0404t:385_1: jalajapupphehi sañchannā sabbakālaṃ surabhī vāyantiyo sandanti,
tika-s0404t:385_5: nahāyitukāmā ca nadititthe ekajjhaṃ vatthābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otaritvā nhatvā uttiṇṇuttiṇṇā upariṭṭhimaṃ upariṭṭhimaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0404t:385_8: Tato eva na tesaṃ koci viggaho vā vivādo vā.
tika-s0404t:385_9: Sattāhikā eva ca nesaṃ kāmaratikīḷā hoti,
tika-s0404t:385_13: Mate ca satte disvā na rodanti na socanti.
tika-s0404t:385_15: Tāvadeva ca nesaṃ tathārūpā sakuṇā upagantvā mataṃ dīpantaraṃ nenti,
tika-s0404t:385_16: tasmā susānaṃ vā asuciṭṭhānaṃ vā tattha natthi,
tika-s0404t:385_17: na ca tato matā nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā upapajjanti.
tika-s0404t:385_18: Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te devaloke nibbattantīti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:388_1: Tatiye esanataṇhāti bhogānaṃ pariyesanavasena pavattā taṇhā.
tika-s0404t:388_4: āsayato payogato ca pariyesanā tathāpavatto cittuppādo.
tika-s0404t:388_8: tampi atthato pariyesanāya laddhameva nāma tathārūpassa kammassa pubbekatattā eva labbhanato.
tika-s0404t:389_1: Sukhaṃ sabhāvato samudayato atthaṅgamato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yāthāvato jānitvā pavattañāṇaṃva sukhavinicchayaṃ.
tika-s0404t:389_3: “Subhaṃ sukha”ntiādikaṃ ārammaṇe abhūtākāraṃ vividhaṃ ninnabhāvena cinoti āropetīti vinicchayo,
tika-s0404t:389_6: Imasmiṃ pana sutte vitakkoyeva āgatoti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:389_12: Vitakkeneva vinicchinantīti etena “vinicchinati etenāti vinicchayo”ti vinicchayasaddassa karaṇasādhanamāha.
tika-s0404t:390_2: Svāyaṃ anāsevanatāya mando hutvā pavatto idhādhippetoti āha “dubbalarāgassādhivacana”nti.
tika-s0404t:390_4: “Mayhaṃ ida”nti hi taṇhāgāho yebhuyyena attaggāhasannissayova hoti.
tika-s0404t:390_7: Taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pariggahakaraṇanti ahaṃ mamanti balavasanniṭṭhānavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa attattaniyaggāhavatthuno
tika-s0404t:390_10: Attanā pariggahitassa vatthuno yassa vasena parehi sādhāraṇabhāvassa asahamāno hoti puggalo,
tika-s0404t:390_13: Saddalakkhaṇena pana yassa dhammassa vasena macchariyayogato puggalo maccharo,
tika-s0404t:390_17: Macchariyassa balavabhāvato ādarena rakkhaṇaṃ ārakkhoti āha “dvāra…pe…
tika-s0404t:391_16: Tenāha bhagavā “aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:394_3: Yasmā te te sattanivāsā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro viya vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0404t:394_10: yo mayā anāvutthapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0404t:394_11: Yadi evaṃ te kasmā idha na gahitāti tattha kāraṇamāha “asabbakālikattā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:394_12: Vehapphalā pana catuttheyeva sattāvāse bhajantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:397_1: Chaṭṭhe pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa catuvīsataṅguliko hattho kukku,
tika-s0404t:397_3: Aṭṭha kukkū upari nemassāti aṭṭha hatthā āvāṭassa upari uggantvā ṭhitā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-s0404t:400_7: bhāyitabbena vā bhayaṃ eva verappasavaṭṭhena veranti ca laddhanāmā cetanādayo.
tika-s0404t:400_11: tato eva cete bhāyitabbā verasañjanakā nāmāti.
tika-s0404t:400_12: Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito pajjanaṃ paṭipatti adhigamo sotāpatti.
tika-s0404t:400_13: Tadatthāya tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni.
tika-s0404t:400_14: Duvidhañhi sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ sotāpattiatthāya ca aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:400_17: Paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t:400_18: yaṃ “sotāpannassa aṅga”ntipi vuccati “sotāpanno aṅgīyati ñāyati etenā”ti katvā,
tika-s0404t:401_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhati,
tika-s0404t:401_6: Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhāto sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyaṇo,
tika-s0404t:402_6: Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti.
tika-s0404t:402_7: So cinteti “etena kira me pitā mārito,
tika-s0404t:402_8: ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati.
tika-s0404t:402_10: idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma tassa verassa mūlabhūtato verakārakapuggalato bahibhāvattā.
tika-s0404t:402_11: Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
tika-s0404t:402_12: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:402_15: Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhantassa nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:402_17: Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati,
tika-s0404t:402_18: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:402_27: surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena verappavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:403_2: Tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni bhavanti,
tika-s0404t:403_6: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:406_1: Navame vasati ettha phalaṃ tannimittatāya pavattatīti vatthu,
tika-s0404t:406_6: Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati,
tika-s0404t:406_9: Taṃ panassa paccayavasena nibbattanaṃ uppādanamevāti vuttaṃ “uppādetī”ti.
tika-s0404t:409_1: Dasame taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:409_2: Padajjhāhārena ca attho veditabboti “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:409_5: Te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā sukhitā vā bhavanti,
tika-s0404t:409_8: Atha vā taṃ kopakāraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa kujjhanakassa ca abhāvato.
tika-s0404t:409_13: Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anatthuppattito.
tika-s0404t:420_1: Dutiye chātaṃ vuccati taṇhādiṭṭhiyo kāmānaṃ pātabbato tāsaṃ vasena vattanato,
tika-s0404t:423_12: So hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya saussāhopi vināsato asāmatthiyato ca jhānadvayato parihīno.
tika-s0404t:426_1: Pañcame aniccatoti iminā niccappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ aniccatamāha.
tika-s0404t:426_2: Tato eva udayavayavantato vipariṇāmato tāvakālikato ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:426_4: taṃ udayavayaparicchinnajarāya maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇataṃ ittarakkhaṇameva ca hoti.
tika-s0404t:426_7: Tato eva ca abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato dukkhavatthuto ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:426_8: Udayavayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhasseva ca adhiṭṭhānabhūto.
tika-s0404t:426_10: Dukkhatāsūlayogato kilesāsucipaggharato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkabhijjanato ca gaṇḍato.
tika-s0404t:426_18: Rūpādidhammāpi yathā na ettha attā atthīti anattā,
tika-s0404t:426_19: evaṃ sayampi attā na hontīti anattā.
tika-s0404t:426_20: Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:427_0: Lakkhaṇattayameva sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetuṃ “yasmā aniccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:427_1: Antosamāpattiyanti samāpattīnaṃ sahajātatāya samāpattīnaṃ abbhantare cittaṃ paṭisaṃharatīti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgādikilesavikkhambhanena
tika-s0404t:427_10: Yathā vipassanā “etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta”ntiādinā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharati,
tika-s0404t:427_11: evaṃ maggo nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisamento tattha labbhamāne sabbepi visese asammohato paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-s0404t:428_0: So tattha ṭhitoti so adandhavipassako yogī tattha tāya aniccādilakkhaṇattayārammaṇāya vipassanāya ṭhito.
tika-s0404t:428_1: Sabbasoti sabbattha tassa tassa maggassa adhigamāya nibbattitasamathavipassanāsu.
tika-s0404t:428_2: Asakkonto anāgāmī hotīti heṭṭhimamaggāvahāsu eva samathavipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pahāya aggamaggāvahāsu
tika-s0404t:429_0: Samatikkantattāti samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti sabbathāpi rūpassa samatikkantattā.
tika-s0404t:429_3: Taṃ atikkammāti idaṃ yo paṭhamaṃ pañcavokāraekavokārapariyāpanne dhamme sammadeva sammasitvā te vissajjetvā
tika-s0404t:432_1: Chaṭṭhe okāsaṃ avasaraṃ adhigacchati etenāti okāsādhigamo,
tika-s0404t:432_4: Ettha ca dīghanikāyeneva pana suttantadesanāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:432_7: Tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti “paṭhamo okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:432_8: Catutthajjhānaṃ pana sukhadukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti dutiyo okāsādhigamo.
tika-s0404t:432_9: Arahattamaggo sabbakilese vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti “tatiyo okāsādhigamo”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:432_10: Idha pana vakkhamānāni tīṇi arūpajjhānāni sandhāya “okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:432_11: Tesaṃyeva ca gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0404t:433_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ pāpanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ
tika-s0404t:433_3: Atthaṃ gamanatthāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
tika-s0404t:433_6: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0404t:434_0: Rāgānugato samādhi abhinato nāma hoti ārammaṇe abhimukhābhāvena pavattiyā,
tika-s0404t:434_2: tadubhayappaṭikkhepena “na cābhinato na cāpanato”ti vuttanti āha “rāgavasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:434_3: Na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagatoti lokiyajjhānacittāni viya na sasaṅkhārena sappayogena tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanappahānavasena
tika-s0404t:437_1: Sattame lokāyatavādakāti āyatiṃ hitaṃ loko na yatati na viruhati etenāti lokāyataṃ,
tika-s0404t:437_3: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0404t:438_3: So eva usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāso.
tika-s0404t:438_7: Yāva kaṇḍappamāṇāti dīghato yattakaṃ kaṇḍassa pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:438_8: tattake dhanudaṇḍe ukkhittamatte āropitesuyeva jiyādaṇḍesu so ce bhāro pathavito muccati,
tika-s0404t:438_9: evaṃ idaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma dhanūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:438_12: Īdiso pana tattha vasibhūto katahattho nāma hotīti āha “ciṇṇavasibhāvo”ti.
tika-s0404t:438_13: Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upecca asanaṃ etena so katūpāsanoti āha “rājakulādīsu dassitasippo”ti.
tika-s0404t:438_14: Evaṃ katanti evaṃ antosusirakaraṇādinā sallahukaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:441_4: sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto
tika-s0404t:441_5: satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
tika-s0404t:441_6: Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:441_7: Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ adāsi “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ pivittha,
tika-s0404t:441_10: Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:441_11: Sakko “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi.
tika-s0404t:441_12: Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:441_17: Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti.
tika-s0404t:441_18: Sakko tesaṃ nivattitvā anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-s0404t:446_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca asuranagarañca.
tika-s0404t:446_2: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:446_4: athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:446_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
tika-s0404t:446_6: Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0404t:446_20: Caturo ca mahattāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā,
tika-s0404t:446_22: tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yujjhituṃ.
tika-s0404t:447_1: tasmā antarā attānaṃ ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya “na idaṃ devanagaraṃ,
tika-s0404t:447_6: tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni gahetvā yuddhasajjā hutvā
tika-s0404t:447_7: asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā uṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0404t:447_8: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ āruhituṃ ārabhanti.
tika-s0404t:447_9: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:447_10: Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati,
tika-s0404t:447_12: kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ viya aññamaññasantāsanamattameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:447_13: Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā te asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti.
tika-s0404t:447_15: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekatova hutvā yujjhanti.
tika-s0404t:447_17: Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti,
tika-s0404t:447_18: tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi tāni pañca balāni osakkanti.
tika-s0404t:447_19: Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocenti.
tika-s0404t:447_20: Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati,
tika-s0404t:447_22: Yadā devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu,
tika-s0404t:447_23: tadā sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ datvā vediyapāde vajirahatthā indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi.
tika-s0404t:447_24: Asurā kālena kālaṃ uṭṭhahitvā paṭimāyo disvā “sakko appamatto tiṭṭhatī”ti tatova nivattanti.
tika-s0404t:447_25: Idha pana yadā asurānaṃ jayo ahosi,
tika-s0404t:448_1: Asurā kira devehi parājitā palāyantā cakkavāḷapabbatābhimukhaṃ gantvā cakkavāḷamahāsamuddapiṭṭhiyaṃ rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇe
tika-s0404t:448_2: vālikāpuline yattha paṇṇakuṭiyo māpetvā isayo vasanti,
tika-s0404t:448_3: tattha gantvā isīnaṃ assamapadena gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti,
tika-s0404t:448_4: gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanapaṇṇasālādīni viddhaṃsenti.
tika-s0404t:448_5: Isayo araññato phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:448_6: tepi punappunaṃ tatheva parājitā gantvā vināsenti.
tika-s0404t:459_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame udāyīti tayo therā udāyī nāma kāḷudāyī, lāḷudāyī,
tika-s0404t:459_10: Paṭilīnā nāma pahīnamānā vuccanti mānussayavasena uṇṇatābhāvato.
tika-s0404t:459_15: bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃgato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo”ti.
tika-s0404t:469_5: añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:469_7: tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato paraṃ ayañca vipassanā virajjati
tika-s0404t:469_8: yogāvacaro viratto puriso viya bhariyāya saṅkhārato etenāti virāgo.
tika-s0404t:472_1: Dutiye saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato yo naṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0404t:472_3: Tabbidūratāya natthi ettha pāranti apāraṃ, saṃsāro.
tika-s0404t:475_1: Chaṭṭhe santaṃ santanti appetvā nisinnassātiādīsu santaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ paṇītantiādīni vadati.
tika-s0404t:475_2: Iminā pana ākārena taṃ paṭivijjhitvā tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharato phalasamāpattisaṅkhāto cittuppādo tathā pavattatīti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:480_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame nātidūranti gocaraṭṭhānato aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya nātidūraṃ.
tika-s0404t:480_2: Nāccāsannanti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ.
tika-s0404t:480_3: Tāya ca pana nātidūranāccāsannatāya gocaraṭṭhānapaṭiparissayādirahitamaggatāya ca gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā gamanāgamanasampannaṃ.
tika-s0404t:481_3: Tamuggahadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā.
tika-s0404t:481_8: Atthaparipucchāya paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ,
tika-s0404t:481_10: Avivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti.
tika-s0404t:481_12: Kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷippadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayappadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0404t:482_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t:485_1: Pañcame kārāpakaappamādo nāma “ime akusalā dhammā pahātabbā,
tika-s0404t:485_2: ime kusalā dhammā upasampādetabbā”ti taṃtaṃparivajjetabbavajjanasampādetabbasampādanavasena pavatto appamādo.
tika-s0404t:485_5: Ayañcāti ca esāti ca appamādameva vadati.
tika-s0404t:486_9: Vassikāya pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti.
tika-s0404t:489_1: Sattame yehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu dhammasaraṇatāya dhammeneva nāthati āsīsati abhibhavatīti nātho vuccati,
tika-s0404t:489_2: te tassa nāthabhāvakarā dhammā nāthakaraṇāti vuttāti āha “attano sanāthabhāvakarā patiṭṭhakarāti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:489_9: So vuttanayena kalyāṇo assa atthīti tassa atthitāmattaṃ kalyāṇamittapadena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:489_10: Assa tena sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kalyāṇasahāyo”ti vuttanti āha “tevassā”ti.
tika-s0404t:489_14: samodhāne pana cittena ceva kāyena ca sampavaṅko.
tika-s0404t:489_15: Sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ anukūlagāhimhi ādaragāravavati puggaleti suvaco.
tika-s0404t:490_1: Tatrupagamaniyāyāti tatra tatra mahante khuddake ca kamme sādhanavasena upāyena upagacchantiyā,
tika-s0404t:490_2: tassa tassa kammassa nipphādane samatthāyāti attho.
tika-s0404t:490_3: Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0404t:491_0: Dhamme assa kāmoti dhammakāmoti byadhikaraṇānampi bāhirattho samāso hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:491_3: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo adhippetoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:491_8: Tena sayañca sakkaccaṃ desetukāmo hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:491_9: Abhidhammo satta pakaraṇāni “adhiko abhivisiṭṭho ca pariyattidhammo”ti katvā.
tika-s0404t:491_15: Kilesavūpasamakaraṇaṃ pubbabhāgiyā tisso sikkhā saṅkhepato vivaṭṭanissito samatho vipassanā ca.
tika-s0404t:491_20: Kusalesu dhammesūti vā nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:494_1: Navame ariyānaṃ eva āvāsāti ariyāvāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ asambhavato.
tika-s0404t:494_3: Te ca yasmā tehi sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsā eva,
tika-s0404t:494_9: adhivāseti parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanañca maggakiccāneva,
tika-s0404t:497_1: Dasame kasmā pana bhagavā kurusu viharanto imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsīti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:497_2: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā tannivāsisattānaṃ yonisomanasikāravantatādinā yebhuyyena suppaṭipannatāya pubbe
tika-s0404t:497_3: ca katapuññatābalena vā tadā utuādisampattiyuttameva ahosi.
tika-s0404t:497_4: Keci pana “pubbe pavattakuruvattadhammānuṭṭhānavāsanāya uttarakuru viya yebhuyyena utuādisampannameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:497_5: Bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:497_6: Tattha bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena niccaṃ kallasarīrā kallacittā ca honti.
tika-s0404t:497_7: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ samatthā paṭiccasamuppādanissitānaṃ gambhīrapaññānañca kārakā honti.
tika-s0404t:498_0: Yuttappayuttāti satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yuttā ceva payuttā ca.
tika-s0404t:498_1: Tasmiñhi janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
tika-s0404t:498_5: tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasi karosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati,
tika-s0404t:498_8: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
tika-s0404t:498_9: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasi karomī”ti vadati,
tika-s0404t:498_10: tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:499_1: eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati.
tika-s0404t:499_2: So bhikkhuniupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato.
tika-s0404t:499_5: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha “buddharakkhitā”ti. Kiṃ, ayyoti.
tika-s0404t:499_8: pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0404t:499_12: So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
tika-s0404t:500_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena aggahesi.
tika-s0404t:500_4: mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ.
tika-s0404t:500_5: Taṃ ānetvā purato ṭhapitaṃ therī āha,
tika-s0404t:501_0: Dīghanikāyādīsu mahānidānādīnīti dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ sāropamaṃ
tika-s0404t:502_2: Ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato.
tika-s0404t:502_3: Mahācittānīti aṭṭhapi mahākiriyacittāni labbhanti “satatavihārā”ti vacanato ñāṇuppattipaccayarahitakālepi pavattijotanato.
tika-s0404t:502_4: Dasa cittānīti aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanacittehi saddhiṃ dasa cittāni labbhanti.
tika-s0404t:502_6: “Upekkhako viharatī”ti vacanato chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti āha “āsevanavasena labbhatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:502_7: Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatto viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato.
tika-s0404t:502_8: Kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:502_9: tattha yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0404t:503_3: Pāṭekkasaccānīti tehi tehi diṭṭhigatikehi pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni “idameva sacca”nti abhiniviṭṭhāni diṭṭhisaccādīni.
tika-s0404t:503_4: Tānipi hi “idameva sacca”nti gahaṇaṃ upādāya “saccānī”ti voharīyanti.
tika-s0404t:504_0: Natthi etāsaṃ vayo vekallanti avayāti āha “anūnā”ti,
tika-s0404t:504_5: Adhigate hi aggaphale sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0404t:509_6: na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇānīti.
tika-s0404t:509_8: Imameva hi yathāvuttalesaṃ apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇasamaññā niruḷhā.
tika-s0404t:510_0: Pakatihatthikulanti giricaranadicaravanacarādippabhedā gocariyakālāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti.
tika-s0404t:510_3: Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhā kathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:510_5: Tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
tika-s0404t:511_2: tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca.
tika-s0404t:511_3: Tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni dissanti,
tika-s0404t:511_6: aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti ‘imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni
tika-s0404t:511_7: evaṃ gahitānī’ti”ādinā vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:511_8: Yāthāvappaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅginaṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-s0404t:512_5: Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-s0404t:512_6: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0404t:513_3: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ,
tika-s0404t:513_6: Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0404t:514_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:514_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa avabujjhanamattena hotīti “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:514_2: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇapavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:515_4: na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0404t:516_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:516_2: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde gatasaddassa viya.
tika-s0404t:517_4: Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā,
tika-s0404t:517_6: Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto karoti,
tika-s0404t:517_7: eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti,
tika-s0404t:517_8: eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati.
tika-s0404t:517_9: Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
tika-s0404t:517_12: Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati,
tika-s0404t:517_24: Tesu ca kammesu “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhissati,
tika-s0404t:517_25: idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:518_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0404t:518_2: Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0404t:518_18: esa bhummadevesū”tiādinā tattha tattha hīnapaṇītasuvaṇṇadubbaṇṇaappaparivāramahāparivāratādibhedaṃ taṃ taṃ visesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva jānāti.
tika-s0404t:519_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0404t:519_14: esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:520_0: Kāmanato kāmetabbato kāmappaṭisaṃyuttato ca dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-
tika-s0404t:520_3: Khandhāyatanadhātulokanti anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:520_21: dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti.
tika-s0404t:520_23: atha kho anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassapi “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto,
tika-s0404t:520_30: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ,
tika-s0404t:520_31: imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ
tika-s0404t:520_33: imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto hotī”tiādinā pajānāti.
tika-s0404t:521_2: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti.
tika-s0404t:521_4: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato.
tika-s0404t:521_9: Taṃ nesaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ bhagavā yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0404t:522_0: Vuddhiṃ hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca.
tika-s0404t:522_3: Āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti,
tika-s0404t:522_11: Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vipassanāmaggañāṇānañca appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti.
tika-s0404t:524_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanijjhāpanaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:524_2: Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma.
tika-s0404t:524_3: Aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho nāma.
tika-s0404t:524_6: Nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro.
tika-s0404t:524_10: Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:524_11: Visesabhāgiyadhammanti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:524_12: Iti saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādidutiyajjhānādipakkhandanāni hānabhāgiyavisesabhāgiyā dhammāti dassitāni.
tika-s0404t:524_13: Tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā ca dhammasaddena vuttā.
tika-s0404t:524_16: Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:524_17: Keci pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:524_18: Te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0404t:524_20: kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī hoti,
tika-s0404t:525_0: Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:525_2: Sakasakakiccameva jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādisakasakameva kiccaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
tika-s0404t:525_9: “Imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:525_11: Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya taṃsadisaṃ,
tika-s0404t:525_15: Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā,
tika-s0404t:525_16: tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:525_17: Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ,
tika-s0404t:525_18: iddhi hutvā vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:525_19: na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:526_0: Evaṃ kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:527_4: Anadhigamassa pana tadubhayampi yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0404t:527_6: Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā.
tika-s0404t:527_7: Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti,
tika-s0404t:527_9: Etena tassā aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva.
tika-s0404t:527_21: Buddhānaṃ pana yadipi āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamato pageva dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamo,
tika-s0404t:527_23: Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena pattanti ca vattabbataṃ labhatīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:530_2: Dāsādīsu sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā adhivacanaṃ paññatti.
tika-s0404t:533_3: asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti attho.
tika-s0404t:533_4: Tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānanti taṃ kasiṇaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:533_10: Paricchinditvāti idaṃ “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:533_11: Paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:533_12: Tena tena vā kāraṇenāti tena tena upariādīsu kasiṇavaḍḍhanakāraṇena.
tika-s0404t:533_14: Yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo,
tika-s0404t:533_15: uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti. Adho ce, adho.
tika-s0404t:533_22: Na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-s0404t:533_25: Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi.
tika-s0404t:534_0: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:534_3: Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ārammaṇaṃ karonto.
tika-s0404t:534_4: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti,
tika-s0404t:534_11: Evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:534_12: tattakaṃ sakalameva pharitvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi uddhaṃadhotiriyatā
tika-s0404t:534_13: vuttāti āha “kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0404t:537_4: Sā hi kilesasenā accharāsaṅghātasabhāvāpi paṭipatthayamānā piyāyitabbaicchitabbarūpasabhāvato piyarūpasātarūpā nāma attano kiccavasena.
tika-s0404t:537_5: Ahaṃ ekova jhāyantoti ahaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca abhāvato eko asahāyo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyanto.
tika-s0404t:537_8: piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ ekova jhāyanto “atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ,
tika-s0404t:537_10: teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī na sampajjatīti.
tika-s0404t:540_4: Na ceva sampāyissantīti na ceva sammadeva pakārehi gahessanti ñāpessanti.
tika-s0404t:540_8: Aññathā ārādhanaṃ nāma natthīti iminā sapaccayanāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvato avabodho eva ito bāhirakānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0404t:541_2: Eko uddesoti ekaṃ uddisanaṃ atthassa saṃkhittavacanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:541_4: Hetunāti “antavantato anaccantikato tāvakālikato niccappaṭikkhepato”ti evamādinā nayena yathā ime saṅkhārā etarahi,
tika-s0404t:541_5: evaṃ atīte anāgate ca aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammāti atītānāgatesu nayena.
tika-s0404t:542_1: Te pana bhavabhedato saṅkhepeneva bhinditvā dassento “kāmabhavādīsū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:542_2: Byadhikaraṇānampi bāhiratthasamāso hoti yathā “urasilomo”ti āha “āhārato ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti.
tika-s0404t:542_4: āhāro ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikāti evaṃ vā ettha samāsaviggaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:542_7: Paccayattho hettha āhārasaddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:542_8: Evañhi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattā pariggahitā honti.
tika-s0404t:542_16: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
tika-s0404t:542_19: Yvāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitāya āhārapariyāyena sāmaññato paccayadhammo vutto,
tika-s0404t:543_0: Codako vuttampi atthaṃ yāthāvato appaṭivijjhamāno neyyatthaṃ suttapadaṃ nītatthato dahanto “sabbe sattā”ti vacanamatte ṭhatvā “nanu cā”tiādinā codeti.
tika-s0404t:543_1: Ācariyo aviparītaṃ tattha yathādhippetamatthaṃ pavedento “na virujjhatī”ti vatvā “tesañhi jhānaṃ āhāro hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:543_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anāhārā”ti vacanaṃ asaññabhave catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:543_5: Evaṃ santepīti idaṃ sāsane yesu dhammesu visesato āhārasaddo niruḷho,
tika-s0404t:543_9: imāya āhārapāḷiyā virodho āpannoti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:543_13: Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāharaṇena rūpakāyaṃ upatthambhenti,
tika-s0404t:543_15: tasmā satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakabhāvo ojādīsu sātisayo labbhamāno mukhyo āhāraṭṭhoti te eva nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇā dhammā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:544_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto,
tika-s0404t:544_1: sabbo paccayadhammo attano phalaṃ āharatīti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ labhatīti.
tika-s0404t:544_6: Nippariyāyāhāropi gahitova hotīti yāvatā sopi paccayabhāveneva janako upatthambhako ca hutvā taṃ taṃ phalaṃ āharatīti vattabbataṃ labhatīti.
tika-s0404t:545_1: nippariyāyāhāroti dvīsu āhāresu asaññabhave yadipi nippariyāyāhāro na labbhati,
tika-s0404t:545_3: Idāni tamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “anuppanne hi buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:545_4: Uppanne buddhe titthakaramatanissitānaṃ jhānabhāvanāya asijjhanato “anuppanne buddhe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:545_5: Sāsanikā tādisaṃ jhānaṃ na nibbattentīti “titthāyatane pabbajitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:545_6: Titthiyā hi upapattivisese vimuttisaññino saññāvirāgāvirāgesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassinova hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0404t:545_8: Vāyokasiṇe parikkammaṃ katvāti vāyokasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiyajjhāne ciṇṇavasī
tika-s0404t:545_9: hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:546_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate,
tika-s0404t:546_1: yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu kasiṇavisesesu rūpavibhāvanena rūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto arūpasamāpattiviseso sacchikarīyati,
tika-s0404t:546_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanā saṅkhāto rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyatīti.
tika-s0404t:546_6: dhi vatetaṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpappavattiyā ādīnavadassanena tadabhāve ca santapaṇītabhāvasanniṭṭhānena
tika-s0404t:546_16: evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0404t:546_17: Titthiyeheva pana tassā samāpattiyā paṭipajjitabbatāya tesañca visayapathe sūpanibandhanasseva tassa
tika-s0404t:546_18: jhānassa paṭipattito diṭṭhivantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva bhūtakasiṇe arūpavirāgabhāvanāparikammaṃ
tika-s0404t:546_20: Kiñca vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya purimabhūtakasiṇattayepi vaṇṇappaṭicchāyāva paṇṇatti ārammaṇaṃ jhānassa lokavohārānurodheneva pavattito.
tika-s0404t:546_21: Evañca katvā visuddhimagge pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:546_22: catutthaṃ pana bhūtakasiṇaṃ bhūtappaṭicchāyameva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti tassevaṃ arūpapaṭibhāgatā
tika-s0404t:547_2: Dhi vatetaṃ cittanti etaṃ mama cittaṃ jigucchitaṃ vata hotu.
tika-s0404t:547_8: Khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvāti cittassa abhāvo eva sādhu suṭṭhūti imaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ tattha ca abhiruciṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0404t:547_10: Titthāyatane pabbajitasseva tathā jhānabhāvanā hotīti āha “manussaloke”ti.
tika-s0404t:547_11: Paṇihito ahosīti maraṇassa āsannakāle ṭhapito ahosi.
tika-s0404t:547_13: yāva bhedā tenevākārena tiṭṭheyyāti āha “tena iriyāpathenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:547_16: Kathaṃ pana acetanānaṃ nesaṃ paccayāhārassa upakappananti codanaṃ sandhāya tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:547_19: Tāva tiṭṭhantīti ukkaṃsato pañca mahākappasatāni tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:548_0: Ye uṭṭhānavīriyena divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappenti,
tika-s0404t:548_5: puññaphalassa pana lesopi natthīti vuttaṃ “ye pana nerayikā…pe…
tika-s0404t:548_8: na yassa kassaci phalassāti adhippāyena “kiṃ pañca āhārā atthī”ti codeti.
tika-s0404t:548_9: Ācariyo nippariyāyāhāre adhippete “siyā tava codanā avasarā,
tika-s0404t:548_10: sā pana ettha anavasarā”ti ca dassento “pañca,
tika-s0404t:548_11: na pañcāti idaṃ na vattabba”nti vatvā pariyāyāhārasseva panettha adhippetabhāvaṃ dassento “nanu paccayo āhāro’ti vuttameta”nti āha.
tika-s0404t:548_12: Tasmāti yassa kassaci paccayassa āhāroti icchitattā.
tika-s0404t:552_1: Aṭṭhame evaṃnāmaketi kajaṅgalāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmake majjhimappadesassa mariyādabhūte nagare.
tika-s0404t:552_9: Nanu ca “eso ceva tassa attho”ti kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:552_19: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti dassitadhammā aññoyevattho bhikkhuniyā dassitoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:555_6: Upassutivasena yujjhitabbākāraṃ ñatvāti jetavane kira dattatthero dhanuggahatissattheroti dve mahallakattherā vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāya vasanti.
tika-s0404t:555_7: Tesu dhanuggahatissatthero pacchimayāme pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya nisinno dattattheraṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ te mahodaro kosalo bhuttabhattameva pūtiṃ karoti,
tika-s0404t:555_9: parājitotveva vadāpetī”ti vatvā tena “kiṃ pana kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte – “bhante,
tika-s0404t:555_10: yuddho nāma padumabyūho cakkabyūho sakaṭabyūhoti tayo byūhā honti,
tika-s0404t:555_11: ajātasattuṃ gaṇhitukāmena asukasmiṃ nāma pabbatakucchismiṃ dvīsu pabbatabhittīsu manusse ṭhapetvā purato
tika-s0404t:555_12: dubbalaṃ dassetvā pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ jānitvā paviṭṭhamaggaṃ rundhitvā purato ca pacchato ca
tika-s0404t:555_13: ubhosu pabbatabhittīsu vaggitvā naditvā jālapakkhittamacchaṃ viya katvā sakkā gahetu”nti.
tika-s0404t:555_14: Tasmiṃ khaṇe “bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti rañño pesitacarapurisā taṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
tika-s0404t:555_15: Taṃ sutvā rājā saṅgāmabheriṃ paharāpetvā gantvā sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā ajātasattuṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0404t:556_8: Āyu pālayanti nirogo avedano jīvitaṃ rakkhanto.
tika-s0404t:556_9: Atha vā saṇikaṃ jīratīti so bhojane mattaññū puggalo parimitāhāratāya saṇikaṃ cirena jīrati jaraṃ pāpuṇāti jīvitaṃ pālayanto.
tika-s0404t:557_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsīti ekasmiṃ kira samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati.
tika-s0404t:557_1: So ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito ca samparivattati,
tika-s0404t:557_2: niddāya abhibhuyyamānopi lahukaṃ nipajjituṃ asakkonto ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
tika-s0404t:562_3: mattabhojino hi sukhaṃ hotī”ti uttaripi puna ovadanto “manujassa sadā satīmato”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
tika-s0404t:563_1: samīpe ṭhitaṃ pana bhāgineyyaṃ sudassanaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ “imaṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇha tātā”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:563_5: imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne mā avaca,
tika-s0404t:563_6: rañño pātarāsaṃ bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā avasāne piṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi,
tika-s0404t:563_8: Atha rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi.
tika-s0404t:563_9: Pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī”ti.
tika-s0404t:563_10: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā taṃ divasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0404t:563_11: Rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi.
tika-s0404t:563_12: Rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu,
tika-s0404t:563_13: sopi māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0404t:563_15: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi “rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī”ti?
tika-s0404t:563_21: Rattaññutāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthīti vaḍḍhitasīlo.
tika-s0404t:563_22: Apothujjanikehi sīlehīti catupārisuddhisīlehi sīlaṃ ariyaṃ suddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:568_4: dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:568_5: Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso,
tika-s0404t:568_8: tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti vuttattā “yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati,
tika-s0404t:568_9: tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:568_10: Asampaṭicchane ādīnavanti bhaddālisutte viya asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā.
tika-s0404t:568_11: Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi sukhavihārova vutto.
tika-s0404t:570_5: Saṅghakammānīti satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalībaddañāyena uposathaṃ pavāraṇañca ṭhapetvā
tika-s0404t:571_1: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-s0404t:574_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-s0404t:575_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
tika-s0404t:575_1: Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti
tika-s0404t:575_3: Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na ca paññapeyya,
tika-s0404t:575_4: tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0404t:575_5: ye ca tannimittameva nirayādīsu nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavanappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0404t:575_6: te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti.
tika-s0404t:575_12: Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā garahanaṃ akitti,
tika-s0404t:577_5: Yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
tika-s0404t:577_10: nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:577_15: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.
tika-s0404t:582_2: Chaṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya na niccā na dhuvāti aniccā.
tika-s0404t:582_3: Tato eva paṇḍitehi na iccā na upagantabbātipi aniccā.
tika-s0404t:582_4: Svāyaṃ nesaṃ aniccaṭṭho udayavayaparicchinnatāya veditabboti āha “hutvā abhāvino”ti,
tika-s0404t:582_8: ekaṃsena asubhādisabhāvā te bālānaṃ subhādibhāvena upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0404t:582_11: Na passanasabhāvāti khaṇapabhaṅguratāittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya dissamānā viya hutvā adassanapakatikā.
tika-s0404t:582_12: Ete hi khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca paññāyitvāpi katipāheneva supinake diṭṭhā viya na paññāyanti.
tika-s0404t:592_7: Jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi anūpadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgo ca utu uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:592_8: anūpadesavāsīnañca jaṅgaladeseti evaṃ parasamuddatīrādivasenapi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva.
tika-s0404t:592_10: Attano pakaticariyānaṃ visayānaṃ visamaṃ kāyapariharaṇavasena jātā visamaparihārajā.
tika-s0404t:592_14: Bāhiraṃ paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ kammavipākatova jātā kammavipākajā.
tika-s0404t:592_15: Tattha purimehi sattahi kāraṇehi uppannā sārīrikā vedanā sakkā paṭibāhituṃ,
tika-s0404t:592_16: kammavipākajānaṃ pana sabbabhesajjānipi sabbaparittānipi nālaṃ paṭighātāya.
tika-s0404t:597_3: Pubbe kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbatto mahākāyo kapirājā hutvā anekasatavānarasahassaparivuto pabbatapāde vicari,
tika-s0404t:597_11: Te apītapubbaṃ disvā sahasāva apivitvā samantā paridhāvitvā mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:597_15: tātā”ti samantā padaṃ pariyesamāno otiṇṇapadaṃyeva addasa,
tika-s0404t:597_18: Tāvadeva ca tattha abhinibbattaamanusso udakaṃ dvedhā katvā uṭṭhāsi –
tika-s0404t:597_36: Evaṃ sante ekampi vānaraṃ na muñcissanti.
tika-s0404t:597_38: na ca te vasaṃ gamissāmā”ti naḷaṃ āharāpetvā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā dhami.
tika-s0404t:597_41: Sesavānarānampi pāṭiyekkaṃ naḷaṃ āharāpetvā dhamitvā adāsi.
tika-s0404t:599_0: Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, neva maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasī”ti. ;
tika-s0404t:600_0: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva ajjadivasā tasmiṃ ṭhāne naḷā ekacchiddāva honti.
tika-s0404t:600_1: Imasmiñhi kappe kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:600_5: Iti sā pokkharaṇī naḷena pānīyassa pivitattā “naḷakapānakā”ti nāmaṃ labhi.
tika-s0404t:600_6: Aparabhāge taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ nissāya nigamo patiṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0404t:601_0: Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti byāpanicchāyaṃ idaṃ āmeḍitavacananti dassetuṃ “yaṃ yaṃ disa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:601_2: saddo “parī”ti iminā samānatthoti āha “tato tato viloketvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:601_3: Kasmā āgilāyati koṭisahassahatthināgānaṃ balaṃ dhārentassāti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:601_8: Dukkhasabhāvesu tesu satthukāye dukkhuppattiyā ayaṃ paccayo”ti dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:601_12: yena aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evarūpaṃ dukkhavipākamanubhavatī”ti? Vuccate –
tika-s0404t:601_13: ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ mallaputto hutvā pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo carati.
tika-s0404t:601_14: So ekadivasaṃ nibbuddhe vattamāne ekaṃ mallaputtaṃ gahetvā gāḷhataraṃ nippīḷesi.
tika-s0404t:601_15: Tena kammena idāni buddho hutvāpi dukkhamanubhavi.
tika-s0404t:601_17: evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnamitthīnaṃ yāni bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni,
tika-s0404t:606_0: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t:617_0: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
tika-s0404t:652_0: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0404t:657_0: Sabbe sakkā ca haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
tika-s0404t:660_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
tika-s0404t:671_0: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
tika-s0404t:682_1: Navame duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:682_6: niyyānaṃ vā phalabhūtaṃ etissā atthīti niyyānikā.
tika-s0404t:683_3: Sā panesā kathā “evarūpā navasurā pītā ratijananī hotī”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0404t:683_8: Visikhāgahaṇena ca tannivāsino gahitā “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:684_6: pattānaṃ kāḷattā kāḷoti pana vattabbo”ti evamādikā. Ādi-
tika-s0404t:684_8: yaṃ yo koci tiriyāmānā katattā”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:684_10: Khatoti etaṃ ekavacanaṃ tehi paccekaṃ khatattā “sāgaradevena khatattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:684_19: abhavoti attakilamathoti iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma honti.
tika-s0404t:684_20: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā itisaddena saṅgaṇhitvā bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:689_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā ca paripuṇṇasīlā.
tika-s0404t:689_11: Idha niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto “sampannasīlā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:689_14: Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0404t:689_15: Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu chasikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti.
tika-s0404t:689_17: Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā
tika-s0404t:689_18: pātimokkhasaṃvaroti ācariyassa sammukhattā appaṭikkhipantova upacārena pucchanto viya vadati.
tika-s0404t:689_24: Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:689_25: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa parivāravasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:690_0: Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:690_3: Tasse vāti “sampannasīlā”ti ettha yaṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva.
tika-s0404t:690_4: Sampannapātimokkhāti ettha pātimokkhaggahaṇena vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā…pe… ādimāha.
tika-s0404t:690_5: Yathā aññatthāpi “idha bhikkhu sīlavā hotī”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya uddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:690_8: “Sīlānisaṃsadassanattha”nti hi ettha byatirekato yaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:690_9: taṃ imissā desanāya kāraṇanti kasmā āraddhanti?
tika-s0404t:690_10: Veneyyānaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanatoti atthato āpanno eva hoti.
tika-s0404t:690_12: Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthanti pana imassa atthaṃ vivarituṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:690_14: “Sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu pana vipākaphalampi “ānisaṃso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:690_17: Vijjamānopi guṇo yāthāvato vibhāvito eva abhiruciṃ uppādeti,
tika-s0404t:690_19: tasmā ekantato ānisaṃsakittanaṃ icchitabbamevāti dassetuṃ “appeva nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:691_1: Piyassa nāma dassanaṃ ekantato abhinanditabbaṃ hotīti āha “piyacakkhūhi sampassitabbo”ti.
tika-s0404t:691_4: Manavaḍḍhanakoti pītimanassa paribrūhanato uparūpari pīticittasseva uppādanako.
tika-s0404t:691_7: Yathā vā aññe ajānantāpi jānantā viya pavattanti,
tika-s0404t:691_10: Passaṃ passatīti dassanabhūtena paññācakkhunā passitabbaṃ passati,
tika-s0404t:691_12: Evaṃ sambhāvanīyoti evaṃ viññutāya paṇḍitabhāvena sambhāvetabbo.
tika-s0404t:691_13: Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti sīlesu paripūrakārī eva bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0404t:691_15: Evañhi iminā padena uparisikkhādvayaṃ anivattitameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:691_16: Yathā pana sīlesu paripūrakārī nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:691_22: Evañca katvā uparisikkhādvayaṃ sīlassa sambhārabhāvena gahitanti sīlassevettha padhānaggahaṇaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:692_0: Ajjhattanti vā attanoti vā ekaṃ ekatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:692_3: “samatha”nti upayogavacanaṃ “anū”ti iminā upasaggena yoge siddhanti āha “attano cittasamathe yutto”ti.
tika-s0404t:692_10: Yo pana īdiso ahutvā jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-s0404t:693_7: Suññāgāragato bhikkhu tattha laddhakāyavivekatāya samathavipassanāvasena cittavivekaṃ paribrūhento yathānusiṭṭhapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0404t:693_8: lokaṃ sāsanañca attano visesādhigamaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ suññāgārañca upasobhayamāno guṇavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0404t:693_9: viññūnaṃ atthato taṃ brūhento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:693_11: Ekabhūmakādipāsāde kurumānopi pana neva suññāgārānaṃ brūhetāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:693_12: Suññāgāraggahaṇena cettha araññarukkhamūlādi sabbaṃ padhānānuyogakkhamaṃ senāsanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:694_0: Ettāvatā yathā taṇhāvicaritadesanā paṭhamaṃ taṇhāvasena āraddhāpi taṇhāpadaṭṭhānattā mānadiṭṭhīnaṃ mānadiṭṭhiyo
tika-s0404t:694_2: evamayaṃ desanā paṭhamaṃ adhisīlasikkhāvasena āraddhāpi sīlapadaṭṭhānattā samathavipassanānaṃ samathavipassanāyo
tika-s0404t:694_4: Ettha hi “sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti ettāvatā adhisīlasikkhā vuttā,
tika-s0404t:694_7: “Brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana samathavasena suññāgāravaḍḍhane adhicittasikkhā,
tika-s0404t:694_8: vipassanāvasena adhipaññāsikkhāti evaṃ dvepi sikkhā saṅgahetvā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:694_9: Ettha ca “ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno”ti imehi padehi sīlānurakkhikā eva cittekaggatā kathitā,
tika-s0404t:695_3: so byādhivihato vikkhittacitto sīlaṃ vināsetvāpi byādhivūpasamaṃ kattā hoti.
tika-s0404t:695_5: so taṃ byādhidukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0404t:695_11: tassa “mama rūpaṃ mama viññāṇa”nti attabhāve balavamamattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:695_12: so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu sampattesu sīlaṃ nāsetvāpi attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti.
tika-s0404t:695_14: tassa attabhāve balavamamattaṃ vā sineho vā na hoti,
tika-s0404t:695_15: so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu sampattesu sacepissa antāni bahi nikkhamanti,
tika-s0404t:695_18: neva sīlaṃ vināsetvā attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti.
tika-s0404t:696_0: “Brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana tasseva ubhayassa brūhanā vaḍḍhanā sātaccakiriyā dassitā.
tika-s0404t:696_2: bhāvanīyo cā”ti ime cattāro dhamme ākaṅkhantena natthaññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:696_4: Īdiso hi sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo.
tika-s0404t:698_0: Attano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
tika-s0404t:699_4: suññāgārāna”nti vatvā idāni yasmā paccayalābhādiṃ patthayantenapi idameva karaṇīyaṃ,
tika-s0404t:699_9: Lābhī assanti lābhāsāya saṃvarasīlaparipūraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-s0404t:699_12: mahākāruṇikatāya pana puggalajjhāsayena evaṃ vuttanti dassento “na bhagavā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:699_14: na vācaṃ payuttaṃ bhaṇeti chinnakatho mūgo viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ ghāsesanaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇe,
tika-s0404t:700_5: Mahantaṃ vā lokiyasukhaṃ phalanti pasavantīti mahapphalā,
tika-s0404t:701_1: Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā kālena katajīvitupacchedā honti,
tika-s0404t:701_8: Kālakato pitā vā mātā vā petayoniyaṃ uppannoti adhikārato viññāyatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:702_1: Na ca maṃ arati saheyyāti maṃ ca arati na abhibhaveyya na maddeyya na ajjhotthareyya.
tika-s0404t:702_3: Sīlādiguṇayutto hi aratiñca ratiñca sahati ajjhottharati,
tika-s0404t:702_5: tasmā īdisamattānaṃ icchantenapi sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:702_8: Taṃ duvidhampi bhayaṃ bheravañca sahati abhibhavatīti bhayabheravasaho.
tika-s0404t:703_0: Thero kira maggaṃ paṭipanno aññataraṃ pāsādikaṃ araññaṃ disvā “idhevajja samaṇadhammaṃ katvā gamissāmī”ti
tika-s0404t:703_1: maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
tika-s0404t:703_2: Rukkhadevatāya dārakā therassa sīlatejena sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu.
tika-s0404t:703_10: Tvaṃ ete vikāre akāsīti. Āma, bhanteti.
tika-s0404t:703_12: sīlatejena dārakā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu,
tika-s0404t:703_17: idāni pana mā maṃ kiñci avaca,
tika-s0404t:703_20: tvaṃ pana ajjekadivasaṃ yattha katthaci vasāhī”ti.
tika-s0404t:703_22: tasmā īdisamattānaṃ icchantenapi sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:706_1: Pañcame imassa hi puggalassa sīlavirahitassa paññā sīlaṃ paridhovatīti akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena sīlaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paññāya suvisodhitaṃ karoti.
tika-s0404t:706_3: ugghaṭitaññutāya pana cātuppadikagāthāpariyosāne paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0404t:706_4: ayaṃ paññāya sīlaṃ dhovati nāma seyyathāpi santatimahāmatto.
tika-s0404t:707_1: Yassa hi puthujjanassa sīlaṃ saṭṭhiasītivassāni akhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:707_2: so maraṇakālepi sabbakilese ghātetvā sīlena paññaṃ dhovitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti kandarasālapariveṇe mahāsaṭṭhivassatthero viya.
tika-s0404t:707_3: There kira maraṇamañce nipajjitvā balavavedanāya nitthunante tissamahārājā “theraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā
tika-s0404t:707_4: pariveṇadvāre ṭhito taṃ saddaṃ sutvā pucchi “kassa saddo aya”nti.
tika-s0404t:707_7: idāni na taṃ vandissāmī”ti nivattitvā mahābodhiṃ vandituṃ gato.
tika-s0404t:707_8: Tato upaṭṭhākadaharo theraṃ āha “kiṃ no, bhante,
tika-s0404t:707_10: saddhopi rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā ‘na vandissāmī’ti gato”ti. Kasmā, āvusoti?
tika-s0404t:707_12: “Tena hi me okāsaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā arahattaṃ patvā daharassa saññaṃ adāsi “gacchāvuso,
tika-s0404t:707_14: Daharo gantvā “idāni kira theraṃ vandathā”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:707_15: Rājā susumārapatitena theraṃ vandanto “nāhaṃ ayyassa arahattaṃ vandāmi,
tika-s0404t:707_16: puthujjanabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhatvā rakkhitasīlameva vandāmī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:712_3: Tattha dve mariyādā kilesamariyādā ca ārammaṇamariyādā ca.
tika-s0404t:712_4: Sace hissa rūpādike ārabbha rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0404t:712_6: Tesu panassa ekopi na uppannoti kilesamariyādā natthi.
tika-s0404t:712_7: Sace panassa rūpādidhamme āvajjentassa ekacce āpāthaṃ nāgaccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0404t:712_9: Te panassa dhamme āvajjentassa āpāthaṃ anāgatadhammo nāma natthīti ārammaṇamariyādāpi natthi.
tika-s0404t:712_10: Idha pana kilesamariyādā adhippetāti āha “kilesamariyādaṃ bhinditvā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:715_2: Tato idhādhippetaṃ niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “koyaṃ kokāliko”ti pucchā.
tika-s0404t:715_3: Suttassa aṭṭhuppattiṃ dassetuṃ “kasmā ca upasaṅkamī”ti pucchā.
tika-s0404t:715_5: Vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmattā appicchatāya ca mā no kassaci…pe… vasiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:715_7: Therā bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādayiṃsu payuttavācāya akatattā therehi ca adāpitattā.
tika-s0404t:715_9: maññeti iminā therānaṃ kohaññe ṭhitabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati avaṇe vaṇaṃ passanto viya,
tika-s0404t:715_10: suparisuddhe ādāsatale jallaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya ca.
tika-s0404t:717_0: Pīḷakā nāma bāhirato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhīni bhindanti,
tika-s0404t:717_1: imā pana paṭhamaṃyeva aṭṭhīni bhinditvā uggatā.
tika-s0404t:717_6: Ārakkhadevatānaṃ saddaṃ sutvāti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0404t:718_3: Piyasīlāti iminā etasmiṃ atthe niruttinayena pesalāti padasiddhīti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:718_5: Yattakanti bhagavato vacanaṃ aññathā karontena yattakaṃ tayā aparaddhaṃ,
tika-s0404t:718_9: tasmā yāvañca te idaṃ aparaddhanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:719_1: Gilitaviso viya visaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya.
tika-s0404t:719_4: Khīṇāsavoti vadati sunakkhatto viya acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:719_8: Pasaṃsiyanindā tāva sampannaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā sāvajjatāya kaṭukavipākā,
tika-s0404t:719_10: Tattha avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṃsiyena tassa samabhāvakaraṇato ca.
tika-s0404t:719_11: Lokepi hi asūraṃ sūrena samaṃ karonto gārayho hoti,
tika-s0404t:720_1: Ayaṃ appamattako aparādho diṭṭhadhammikattā sappatikārattā ca tassa.
tika-s0404t:720_2: Ayaṃ mahantataro kali katūpacitassa samparāyikattā appatikārattā ca.
tika-s0404t:721_2: Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upetīti ettha yathāvuttaāyuppamāṇaṃ pākatikavasena ariyūpavādinā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:721_3: Aggasāvakānaṃ pana guṇamahantatāya tatopi ativiya mahantataramevāti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:722_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampatīti ko ayaṃ brahmā,
tika-s0404t:722_1: kasmā ca pana bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocāti?
tika-s0404t:722_2: Ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma bhikkhu anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsesu uppanno,
tika-s0404t:722_7: bhagavā ācikkhanto ariyūpavāde ādīnavaṃ pakāsessatī”ti iminā kāraṇena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca.
tika-s0404t:723_1: Paccitabbaṭṭhānassāti nirayadukkhena paccitabbappadesassa etaṃ abbudoti nāmaṃ.
tika-s0404t:723_2: Vassagaṇanāti ekato paṭṭhāya dasaguṇitaṃ abbudaāyumhi tato aparaṃ vīsatiguṇitaṃ nirabbudādīsu vassagaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:723_3: Ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ dukkarāti vuttaṃ “na taṃ sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”nti.
tika-s0404t:723_4: Keci pana “tattha tattha paridevanānattena kammakāraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0404t:723_7: Esa nayoti heṭṭhimato uparimassa vīsatiguṇataṃ atidisati.
tika-s0404t:728_2: Catutthe tapanaṃ santapanaṃ kāyassa khedanaṃ tapo,
tika-s0404t:728_8: Lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ sādhusammatācāravirahato na pasādanīyaṃ ājīvati vattatīti lūkhājīvī,
tika-s0404t:731_5: Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā bhagavā attānaṃ dassesīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0404t:731_6: Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:731_11: Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā,
tika-s0404t:731_18: So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:734_1: Chaṭṭhe khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṭṭhena “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0404t:734_7: Yathā cāha “tadapi phassapaccayā phussa phussa paṭisaṃvediyantī”ti ca.
tika-s0404t:734_17: “tassevaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:734_18: atthi me attāti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:735_0: Yā diṭṭhīti idāni vuccamānānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ padānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ mūlapadaṃ.
tika-s0404t:735_2: diṭṭhīsu vā gataṃ idaṃ dassanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhīsu antogadhattātipi diṭṭhigataṃ,
tika-s0404t:735_5: natthettha attā vā nicco vā kocīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:735_7: Duratikkamaṭṭhena sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena ca kantāro dubbhikkhakantāravāḷakantārādayo viya.
tika-s0404t:735_11: kadāci ucchedassa vā gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditanti vipphanditaṃ.
tika-s0404t:735_13: Diṭṭhiyeva anto tudanaṭṭhena dunnīharaṇīyaṭṭhena ca sallanti diṭṭhisallaṃ.
tika-s0404t:738_1: Navame ajjhogāhetvā adhippetamatthaṃ sambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ dukkhāni durabhisambhavāni.
tika-s0404t:738_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tattha nivāsoyeva dukkhoti dassetuṃ “sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:738_4: Vanapatthasaddo hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:738_7: rūpādiputhuttārammaṇe pakārato gamanādiiriyāpathappakārehi attano kāyassa vivecanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:738_8: gacchatopi tiṭṭhatopi nisajjatopi nipajjatopi ekasseva pavatti.
tika-s0404t:738_9: Teneva hi vivecetabbānaṃ vivecanākārassa ca bhedato bahuvidhattā te ekattena gahetvā “paviveka”nti ekavacanena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:738_10: Dukkaraṃ pavivekanti vā pavivekaṃ kattuṃ na sukhanti attho.
tika-s0404t:738_15: Bhayasantāsuppādanena khādituṃ āgatā yakkharakkhasapisācādayo viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:738_17: Tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehīti vāteritānaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ migapakkhiādīnañca bhīsanakehi bheravehi saddehi.
tika-s0404t:738_18: Vividhehi ca aññehi khāṇuādīhi yakkhādiākārehi upaṭṭhitehi bhīsanakehi.
tika-s0404t:745_6: Yathā micchādiṭṭhi vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā,
tika-s0404t:745_7: evaṃ micchāsaṅkappādayopi vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti ayamattho “micchāsaṅkappassā”tiādīsu
tika-s0404t:745_8: sabbapadesu vattabboti dasseti “evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbo”ti iminā.
tika-s0404t:745_9: Ettha cāti “sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti etasmiṃ pāḷipade.
tika-s0404t:745_10: Ettha ca samucchedavasena ca paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ sammadeva vimuccanaṃ sammāvimutti.
tika-s0404t:745_11: Tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṃ upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni.
tika-s0404t:745_14: Idañhi somanassindriyaṃ ukkaṃsagatasātasabhāvato sampayuttadhamme sinehantaṃ tementaṃ viya pavattati.
tika-s0404t:750_2: Tatiye jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti eva.
tika-s0404t:750_3: Na hi padesañāṇe ṭhito jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0404t:750_4: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi avisesaggahaṇena ca “jāna”nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya
tika-s0404t:750_7: Passitabbameva passatīti dibbacakkhupaññācakkhudhammacakkhubuddhacakkhusamantacakkhusaṅkhātehi ñāṇacakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passati eva.
tika-s0404t:750_8: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti,
tika-s0404t:750_10: Bhagavā pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva,
tika-s0404t:750_12: Cakkhu viya bhūtoti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto.
tika-s0404t:750_13: Yathā hi cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti sādheti,
tika-s0404t:750_14: evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanatopi dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto,
tika-s0404t:750_15: paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhuñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā cakkhubhūto.
tika-s0404t:751_1: Aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto.
tika-s0404t:751_3: Dhammā vā bodhipakkhiyā tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato,
tika-s0404t:751_4: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ patto adhigatoti dhammabhūto.
tika-s0404t:751_11: Atthaṃ nīharitvāti dukkhādiatthaṃ tatthāpi pīḷanādiatthaṃ uddharitvā.
tika-s0404t:751_13: Amatādhigamapaṭipattidesanāya amatasacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā.
tika-s0404t:754_2: Athāyaṃ itarā pajāti yā panāyaṃ avasesā pajā sakkāyadiṭṭhitīrameva anudhāvati,
