tika-s0404t:754_6: Dhammānuvattinoti taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tadanucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaphalasacchikaraṇena dhammānuvattino.
tika-s0404t:754_8: Suduttaraṃ taritvā pāramessantīti ye janā dhammānuvattino,
tika-s0404t:754_9: te etaṃ suduttaraṃ duratikkamaṃ māradheyyaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā nibbānapāraṃ gamissanti.
tika-s0404t:755_0: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāyāti kāyaduccaritādibhedaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ jahitvā.
tika-s0404t:755_1: Sukkaṃ bhāvethāti paṇḍito bhikkhu abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā kāyasucaritādibhedaṃ sukkaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveyya.
tika-s0404t:755_4: Ālayato nikkhamitvā anālayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭicca ārabbha.
tika-s0404t:756_0: Tatrābhiratimiccheyyāti yasmiṃ anālayasaṅkhāte viveke nibbāne imehi sattehi durabhiramaṃ,
tika-s0404t:756_3: Cittaklesehīti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi attānaṃ pariyodapeyya vodāpeyya,
tika-s0404t:757_1: Sammā cittaṃ subhāvitanti sammā hetunā nayena cittaṃ suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:757_3: arahattamaggañāṇajutiyā khandhādibhede dhamme jotetvā ṭhitāti attho.
tika-s0404t:757_4: Te loke parinibbutāti te imasmiṃ khandhādiloke parinibbutā nāma arahattappattito paṭṭhāya kilesavaṭṭassa khepitattā saupādisesena,
tika-s0404t:757_5: carimacittanirodhena khandhavaṭṭassa khepitattā anupādisesena cāti dvīhi parinibbānehi parinibbutā,
tika-s0404t:757_6: anupādāno viya padīpo apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
tika-s0404t:758_0: Ito paraṃ yāva tatiyo paṇṇāsako, tāva uttānatthameva.
tika-s0404t:764_3: Sevālamālikāti pātova udakaṃ orohitvā sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā attano udakasuddhikabhāvajānanatthañceva
tika-s0404t:764_4: “lokassa ca udakena suddhi hotī”ti imassa atthassa jānanatthañca mālaṃ katvā pilandhanakā.
tika-s0404t:764_5: Udakorohakāti pāto majjhanhe sāyanhe ca udakaorohaṇakā.
tika-s0404t:769_2: Navame yasmiṃ santāne kāmāvacarakammaṃ mahaggatakammañca katūpacitaṃ vipākadāne laddhāvasaraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:769_3: tesu kāmāvacarakammaṃ itaraṃ nīharitvā sayaṃ tattha ṭhatvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:769_4: mahaggatakammameva pana itaraṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti garubhāvato.
tika-s0404t:778_14: na devakāye brahmakāye vāti dassetuṃ “ye gottapaṭisārino”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:778_16: ahaṃ kassapo”ti paṭi paṭi attano gottaṃ anussaranti paṭijānanti vāti attho.
tika-s0404t:783_6: Sā heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti,
tika-s0404t:783_7: taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavaseneva divase divase bhuñjanti.
tika-s0404t:783_9: so jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-s0404t:783_10: tesaṃyeva divasavasena satta divase yāpanasamattho hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:783_12: Aṭṭhannañhi samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjanassa samayopi atthi tassa asamayopi,
tika-s0404t:783_13: maggavimokkhena pana vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi.
tika-s0404t:783_16: tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa khādantassa bhuñjantassa ca maggaphalappaṭivedho nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:783_17: Iti maggavimokkhena vimuccantassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti maggavimokkho asamayavimutti nāma.
tika-s0404t:786_2: Samparivattamānāti dakkhiṇeneva passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā.
tika-s0404t:786_4: Sukhaṃ supatīti ettha duvidhā supanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyāmayacittehi avokiṇṇabhavaṅgappavattilakkhaṇā ca.
tika-s0404t:786_6: Yasmā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati,
tika-s0404t:787_0: Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ vijambhanaṃ
tika-s0404t:787_1: ito cito ca viparivattanañca hotīti āha “nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:787_2: Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādivirahitova paṭibujjhati.
tika-s0404t:788_0: Bhaddakameva supinaṃ passatīti idaṃ anubhūtapubbavasena devatūpasaṃhāravasena cassa bhaddakameva supinaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:788_3: Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:789_0: Ure āmukkamuttāhāro viyāti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici taṃ ekāvalivasena vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-s0404t:789_1: anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:790_0: Visākhatthero viyāti so kira pāṭaliputte kuṭumbiyo ahosi.
tika-s0404t:790_1: So tattheva vasamāno assosi “tambapaṇṇidīpo kira cetiyamālālaṅkato kāsāvapajjoto,
tika-s0404t:790_2: icchiticchitaṭṭhāneyevettha sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā,
tika-s0404t:790_3: utusappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti sabbamettha sulabha”nti.
tika-s0404t:790_4: So attano bhogakkhandhaṃ puttadārassa niyyātetvā dussante baddhena ekakahāpaṇeneva gharā nikkhamitvā samuddatīre nāvaṃ udikkhamāno ekaṃ māsaṃ vasi.
tika-s0404t:790_5: So vohārakusalatāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇitvā asukasmiṃ vikkiṇanto dhammikāya vaṇijjāya tenevantaramāsena sahassaṃ abhisaṃhari.
tika-s0404t:790_6: Iti anupubbena mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācati.
tika-s0404t:790_7: So pabbājanatthāya sīmaṃ nīto taṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikantarena bhūmiyaṃ pātesi.
tika-s0404t:790_11: idāneva naṃ vicārehī”ti vutte “visākhassa pabbajjaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā mā rittahatthā gamiṃsū”ti muñcitvā sīmāmāḷake vikkiritvā pabbajitvā upasampanno.
tika-s0404t:790_12: So pañcavasso hutvā dvemātikā paguṇā katvā attano sappāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekekasmiṃ vihāre cattāro cattāro māse samapavattavāsaṃ vasamāno cari.
tika-s0404t:794_0: Etthantare khalitaṃ natthi, aho lābho te mārisā”ti. ;
tika-s0404t:795_0: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ patvā “ayaṃ nu kho maggo,
tika-s0404t:795_2: Athassa pabbate adhivatthā devatā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “eso maggo”ti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:795_3: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā tattha cattāro māse vasitvā “paccūse gamissāmī”ti cintetvā nipajji.
tika-s0404t:795_4: Caṅkamasīse maṇilarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sopānaphalake nisīditvā parodi.
tika-s0404t:795_9: Mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ ko guṇoti? Tumhesu, bhante,
tika-s0404t:795_10: idha vasantesu amanussā aññamaññaṃ mettaṃ paṭilabhanti,
tika-s0404t:795_11: te dāni tumhesu gatesu kalahaṃ karissanti,
tika-s0404t:795_13: Thero “sace mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ phāsuvihāro hoti,
tika-s0404t:795_14: sundara”nti vatvā aññepi cattāro māse tattheva vasitvā puna tatheva gamanacittaṃ uppādesi.
tika-s0404t:795_16: Eteneva upāyena thero tattheva vasitvā tattheva parinibbāyīti.
tika-s0404t:795_17: Evaṃ dhamattāvihārī bhikkhu amanussānaṃ piyo hoti.
tika-s0404t:796_0: Balavapiyacittatāyāti iminā balavapiyacittatāmattenapi satthaṃ na kamati,
tika-s0404t:796_3: kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato khippameva samādhiyati,
tika-s0404t:796_6: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti. Yathāha –
tika-s0404t:798_0: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā”ti. ; Ca ādi –
tika-s0404t:799_0: Tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato brahmavihārānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:799_4: Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu siddhesu sukhasupanādayo hatthagatā eva hontīti.
tika-s0404t:802_1: Chaṭṭhe beluvagāmaketi vesāliyā dakkhiṇapasse avidūre beluvagāmako nāma atthi,
tika-s0404t:803_1: saddoti tassa “bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato adhigato supākaṭo ca,
tika-s0404t:803_2: taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya atthabhāveneva dassento “yo so…pe…
tika-s0404t:803_4: Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ visayavisese pavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇavisesavasena,
tika-s0404t:803_7: sabbaññutaññāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena ca tadatthaṃ yojetvā dassento “tesaṃ tesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:803_12: Desanāpaññāya passatāti desetabbadhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ bodhaneyyapuggalānañca āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiādibhedaṃ
tika-s0404t:803_15: pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā sāsanassa vā paccatthikānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:803_16: Tesaṃ pana hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhaṇañca.
tika-s0404t:804_0: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā.
tika-s0404t:804_1: Kāyakammādivasena tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ ñāṇānuparivattito nisammakāritāya passatā.
tika-s0404t:804_3: Chandādīnaṃ ahānihetubhūtāya akkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya sammāsambuddhenāti evaṃ dasabalaaṭṭhārasaāveṇikabuddhadhammavasenapi
tika-s0404t:805_0: Abhisaṅkhatanti attano paccayehi abhisammukhabhāvena samecca sambhuyya kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:805_3: Te cassa paccayā cetanāpadhānāti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita”nti vuttanti “cetayitaṃ kappayita”nti atthamāha.
tika-s0404t:805_4: Abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitanti ca jhānassa pātubhāvadassanamukhena viddhaṃsanabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti.
tika-s0404t:805_8: Samathavipassanādhamme ṭhitoti ettha samathadhamme ṭhitattā samāhito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aniccānupassanādīhi
tika-s0404t:805_9: niccasaññādayo pajahanto anukkamena taṃ anulomañāṇaṃ pāpetā hutvā vipassannādhamme ṭhito.
tika-s0404t:806_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ yathārutavaseneva imassa suttapadassa atthe gahetabbe sati.
tika-s0404t:806_1: Samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabboti anāgāmiphalaṃ anibbattetvā tadatthāya samathavipassanāpi anibbattetvā
tika-s0404t:806_2: kevalaṃ tattha chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati. Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:806_3: Tesu samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu chandarāgamattena anāgāminā laddhabbassa aladdhaanāgāmiphalenapi laddhabbattā.
tika-s0404t:806_4: Tathā sati tena anāgāmiphalampi laddhabbameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:806_6: Sabhāvato rasitabbattā aviparīto attho eva attharaso.
tika-s0404t:807_0: Aññāpi kāci sugatiyoti vinipātike sandhāyāha. Aññāpi kāci duggatiyoti asurakāyamāha.
tika-s0404t:808_0: Appaṃ yācitena bahuṃ dentena uḷārapurisena viya ekaṃ dhammaṃ pucchitena “ayampi ekadhammo”ti kathitattā
tika-s0404t:808_1: ekādasapi dhammā pucchāvasena ekadhammo nāma jāto paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanañāyena.
tika-s0404t:808_6: sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni ekarasāpi amatādhigamassa paṭipattiyāti attho.
tika-s0404t:808_7: Evamettha aggaphalabhūmi anāgāmiphalabhūmīti dveva bhūmiyo sarūpato āgatā,
tika-s0404t:808_8: nānantariyatāya pana heṭṭhimāpi dve bhūmiyo atthato āgatā evāti daṭṭhabbāti.
tika-s0404t:811_3: Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ekanāḷikā.
tika-s0404t:811_4: Ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti ekanāḷikā.
tika-s0404t:811_6: Cattāro aṃsā bhāgā atthasallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti caturassā.
tika-s0404t:811_8: Niyamato nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissā atthīti nisinnavattikā,
tika-s0404t:811_9: yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpikāti attho.
tika-s0404t:811_11: Ekekassapi padassa piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahūnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā ekamekassa padassa atthavaṇṇanā ayaṃ sabbattha labbhati.
tika-s0404t:811_15: Pariyosānagamananti keci tāva āhu “kaṇhapakkhe upamaṃ dassetvā upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyasampaṭipādanatthāti
tika-s0404t:811_16: upameyyatthaṃ āharitvā saṃkilesapakkhaniddeso ca vodānapakkhavibhāvanatthāyāti sukkapakkhampi upamopameyyavibhāgena
tika-s0404t:811_18: Kaṇhapakkhe upameyyaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanādīsupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0404t:811_20: sukkapakkhe ca taṃtaṃupamūpameyyatthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpetvāva kathanaṃ pariyosānagamana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:811_23: Sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇāti sabbehipi pubbācariyehi ācaritā saṃvaṇṇitā,
tika-s0404t:812_5: Taṃ pana pariharaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vicaraṇanti āha “pariggahetvā vicaritu”nti.
tika-s0404t:812_8: parimāṇaparicchedopi sarīrarūpampīti āha “gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā”ti.
tika-s0404t:813_0: Dhanusattisūlādīti ettha issāsācariyānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ dhanulakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:813_2: Issarabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ sūlalakkhaṇanti yojanā. Ādi-
tika-s0404t:813_3: saddena rāmavāsudevagaṇādīnaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ pharasucakkādilakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:817_2: Yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti.
tika-s0404t:818_0: Dvīhākārehīti vuttaṃ ākāradvayaṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:818_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatāti “upacayo santatī”ti jātiṃ dvidhā bhinditvā hadayavatthuṃ aggahetvā dasāyatanāni
tika-s0404t:818_4: Rūpakoṭṭhāsāti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā kalāpabhāveneva pavattanato rūpakalāpā.
tika-s0404t:818_7: tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0404t:819_1: Tattha rūpaṃ pariggahetvāti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā.
tika-s0404t:819_2: Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvāti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe arūpanti vavatthapetvā.
tika-s0404t:819_3: Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti puna tattha yaṃ rūppanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:819_6: Ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci natthi attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti evaṃ rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā.
tika-s0404t:819_7: Tadubhayañca avijjādinā paccayena sapaccayanti paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā,
tika-s0404t:819_8: aniccatādilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā yo kalāpasammasanādikkamena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:820_9: vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ cittavasenāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:820_18: kabaḷīkāro āhāroti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhārakammavasena catusamuṭṭhānaṃ. Upacayo, santati, jaratā,
tika-s0404t:820_19: rūpassa aniccatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ na kutoci samuṭṭhātīti na jānāti.
tika-s0404t:820_20: Samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānantotiādīsu vattabbaṃ “gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto”tiādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:821_0: Kammalakkhaṇoti attanā kataṃ duccaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, bālo.
tika-s0404t:821_11: Attanā kataṃ sucaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, paṇḍito.
tika-s0404t:822_0: Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevatīti yaṃ bālapuggale vajjetvā paṇḍitasevanaṃ atthakāmena kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:822_2: Tathābhūtassa ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ puna “bāle vajjetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:822_3: Tattha yaṃ bhagavatā “idaṃ vo kappatī”ti anuññātaṃ,
tika-s0404t:822_23: satekicchātekicchaṃ ajānanto suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:822_26: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ajānanto khandhādīsu akusalatāya rūpārūpapariggahampi kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:823_0: Govaṇasadise attabhāve uppajjitvā tattha dukkhuppattihetuto micchāvitakkā āsāṭikā viyāti āsāṭikāti āha “akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:824_2: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato chahi vaṇamukhehi vissandamānayūso gaṇḍo viya
tika-s0404t:824_3: pilotikākhaṇḍena chadvārehi vissandamānakilesāsuci attabhāvavaṇo satisaṃvarena pidahitabbo,
tika-s0404t:824_4: ayaṃ pana evaṃ na karotīti āha “yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
tika-s0404t:825_0: Yathā dhūmo indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjamāno saṇho sukhumo,
tika-s0404t:825_1: taṃ taṃ vivaraṃ anupavissa byāpento sattānaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādiparissayaṃ vinodeti,
tika-s0404t:825_3: evaṃ dhammadesanāñāṇassa indhanabhūtaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ nissāya uppajjamānā saṇhā sukhumā taṃ taṃ
tika-s0404t:825_7: tasmā dhūmo viyāti dhūmoti āha “gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:825_8: Attano santikaṃ upagantvā nisinnassa kātabbā tadanucchavikā dhammakathā upanisinnakakathā.
tika-s0404t:825_12: Nanu attano jānāpanatthaṃ dhammakathādi na kātabbamevāti?
tika-s0404t:825_14: suddhāsayena pana dhamme kathite tassa guṇajānanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:827_0: Bhāsaye jotaye dhammaṃ, paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja”nti.
tika-s0404t:828_2: Yathā pana taṃ udakena otiṇṇasattānaṃ sarīramalaṃ pavāheti,
tika-s0404t:828_5: evaṃ bahussutā attano samīpaṃ otiṇṇasattānaṃ dhammodakena cittamalaṃ pavāhenti,
tika-s0404t:828_11: idaṃ byañjanaṃ ayaṃ saddo kathaṃ imasmiṃ atthe ropetabbo,
tika-s0404t:828_12: kena pakārena imassa atthassa vācako jāto.
tika-s0404t:828_14: nirūpetabbaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti kathamettha nirūḷhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:828_15: Imassa bhāsitassa ko atthoti saddatthaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0404t:828_20: Na paripucchatīti vimaticchedanapucchāvasena sabbaso pucchaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0404t:828_21: Na paripañhatīti pari pari attano ñātuṃ icchaṃ na ācikkhati,
tika-s0404t:828_25: Vivaraṇaṃ nāma atthassa vibhajitvā kathananti āha “bhājetvā na desentī”ti.
tika-s0404t:828_27: Na uttāniṃ karontīti sinerupādamūle vālikaṃ uddharanto viya pathavīsandhārodakaṃ vivaritvā dassento viya ca uttānaṃ na karonti.
tika-s0404t:829_0: Evaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena bahussutā “tittha”nti vuttā pariyāyato.
tika-s0404t:829_1: Idāni tameva dhammaṃ nippariyāyato “tittha”nti dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:829_2: Dhammo hi taranti otaranti etena nibbānaṃ nāma taḷākanti “tittha”nti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:831_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe”ti. –
tika-s0404t:832_0: Dhammasseva nibbānassotaraṇatitthabhūtassa otaraṇākāraṃ ajānanto “dhammatitthaṃ na jānātī”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:833_0: Pītāpītanti gogaṇe pītaṃ apītañca gorūpaṃ na jānāti,
tika-s0404t:833_3: “Ānisaṃsaṃ na vindatī”ti vatvā tassa avindanākāraṃ dassento “dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:834_3: Aṭṭhaṅgikanti ca visuṃ ekajjhañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ upādāya gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:834_5: Evañca katvā sattaṅgassapi ariyamaggassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0404t:835_2: tattha sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā nibbānārammaṇā lokuttarāti evaṃ “ime lokiyā,
tika-s0404t:836_0: Anavasesaṃ duhatīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto kismiñci dāyake saddhāhāniyā,
tika-s0404t:837_0: “Ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti iminā navakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti ācariyupajjhāyesu pitupemassa anupaṭṭhāpanato,
tika-s0404t:837_3: Na hi sīlādiguṇehi sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti,
tika-s0404t:837_8: Vuttavipallāsavasenāti “na rūpaññū”tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena aggahaṇavasena.
tika-s0404t:837_9: Yojetvāti “rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0404t:837_11: pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī”tiādinā ca atthaṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0404t:837_12: Veditabboti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pade yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:844_2: Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāranti pubbe vuttaaṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva anunigamavasena vadati.
tika-s0404t:844_5: aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ manorathapūraṇiṃ karonto sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0404t:844_7: Mahāvihārādhivāsīnanti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ “mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ samayaṃ pakāsayantī,
tika-s0404t:844_10: Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampattena
tika-s0404t:844_11: nibbānasukhena sukhī sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
tika-s0404t:855_0: Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yaṃ caññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t:863_0: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva imaṃ pajaṃ;
tika-s0404t:865_0: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
